English Sentence: The Israeli Air Force launches an attack against tunnels leading from Gaza into Israel in response to missile attacks and mortar fire.
Amharic Sentence: የእስራኤል አየር ሃይል የተቃጣበትን የሚሳኤል እና የሞርታር ጥቃት ማላሽ ነው ሲል በጋዛ ሰርጥ ላይ ጥቃት መፈፀም ጀመረ።

English Sentence: Atheist Ireland purposefully publishes the words of Jesus Christ, Muhammad, Salman Rushdie, Mark Twain and Pope Benedict XVI on its website despite a new law banning them on grounds of blasphemy.
Amharic Sentence: አምላክ የለሽ አየርላንድ የኢየሱስ ክርስቶስን፣ መሐመድን፣ ሳልማን ራሽዲን፣ ማርክ ትዌንን እና ርዕሰ ሊቃነ ጳጳሳት ቤኔዲክት 16ኛን ንግግሮችን ማተም ስድብ በመሆኑ ምክንያት አዲሱ ህግ ቢከለክለውም ሆን ብሎ በድረ-ገጹ ላይ አሳትሟል።

English Sentence: Egyptian archaeologists discover the largest tomb yet discovered in the ancient Saqqara necropolis.
Amharic Sentence: የግብፅ የቁፋሮ ተመራማሪዎች በቀደምት የሳቃራ መካነ መቃብር በጣም ትልቅ የሆነ አዲስ የመቃብር ስፍራ አገኙ።

English Sentence: A diesel fuel leak in Shaanxi, China reaches the Yellow River, a water source for millions of people.
Amharic Sentence: በሻንቺ ፣ ቻይና ውስጥ የተከሰተው የናፍጣ ነዳጅ መፍሰስ በሚሊዮኖች ለሚቆጠሩ ሰዎች የውሃ ምንጭ ወደሆነው የሎው ወንዝ ደረሰ።

English Sentence: Slovakia admits responsibility for a major bomb alert on Dorset Street in Dublin, Ireland, after planting explosives on a civilian as a test.
Amharic Sentence: ስሎቫኪያ በአየርላንዷ ዱብሊን ከተማ ዶርሴት መንገድ ላይ ንፁሃን ሰዎች ባሉበት አካባቢ ስለጠቃጣው የፈንጂ አደጋ ሀላፊነቱን እንደምትወስድ አስታወቀች።

English Sentence: A weekend killing in Australia has prompted the Indian government to issue an advisory for its college students studying in that country.
Amharic Sentence: በአውስትራሊያ በሳምንቱ መጨረሻ ላይ የተፈጸመው ግድያ የህንድ መንግስት በዚያ ሀገር ለሚማሩ የኮሌጅ ተማሪዎቿ ምክር እንድትሰጥ አነሳስቷል።

English Sentence: Sékouba Konaté, the interim head of the junta in Guinea, is flown to Senegal after falling ill.
Amharic Sentence: ሴኮባ ኮናቴ ጊኒ ውስጥ የሚገኝ ጁንታ ጊዜያዊ መሪ በመታመሙ ወደ ሴኔጋል ተወሰደ።

English Sentence: South African President Jacob Zuma urges party unity and warns economic recovery will be slow at a gathering celebrating the 98th anniversary of the African National Congress.
Amharic Sentence: የደቡብ አፍሪካው ፕሬዚደንት ጃኮብ ዙማ የፓርቲያቸው የአፍሪካ ህብረት ኮንግረስ የ98ኛ አመት ክብረ በዓል ላይ ከኢኪኖሚያዊው ጫና የሚያገግሙበት አካሄድ እየዘገየ እንደሆነ አስጠነቀቁ።

English Sentence: The Confederation of African Football announces that football matches will continue to be played in Cabinda Province where the attack took place.
Amharic Sentence: የአፍሪካ እግር ኳስ ኮንፌዴሬሽን ጥቃቱ በተፈጸመበት በካቢንዳ ግዛት የእግር ኳስ ጨዋታዎች እንደሚቀጥሉ አስታወቀ።

English Sentence: Wolfgang Wodarg, the Council of Europe's head of health affairs, claims that the 2009 flu pandemic was a "false pandemic" orchestrated by the pharmaceutical industry to sell vaccines.
Amharic Sentence: የአውሮፓ የጤንነት ካውንስል መሪ የሆነው ዎልፍጋንገ ዎዳርግ የ2009 የጉንፋን ወረርሽኝ በመዳኒት አቅራቢዎች ክትባቶችን ለመሸጥ ሲባል የተቀነባበረ የውሸት ወረርሽኝ እንደሆነ ተናገሩ።

English Sentence: Thousands of supporters of former Thai Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra gather outside the home of a royal adviser accused of involvement in the 2006 coup that ousted the Prime Minister.

English Sentence: Tombs discovered near Egypt's pyramids reinforce the theory they were built by free workers rather than slaves.
Amharic Sentence: በግብፅ ራሚዶች አጠገብ የተገኙ አዲስ መካነ መቃብሮች፤ መቃብሮች በባሪያዎች ሳይሆን በነፃ ሰዎች እንደተሰሩ ማረጋገጫዎች እንደሚሆኑ አስታወቁ።

English Sentence: Australia experiences its hottest night since 1902, as a heat wave grips the country.

English Sentence: Turkish police arrest at least 14 military officers, including four generals, accused of a 2003 coup plot.

English Sentence: Al-Qaeda's top leader in Afghanistan, and Osama bin Laden's third in command, Mustafa Abu al-Yazid, is reported killed.
Amharic Sentence: በአፍጋኒሳትን ከአልቃይዳ ዋና አመራሮች የነበረው እና የኦሳማ ቢላደን ሶሰተኛ አዛዥ የነበርው ሙሰጠፋ አቡ አል ያዚድ እንደተገደለ ተነገረ።

English Sentence: Poland publishes the transcript of flight data recorders from the fatal 2010 Polish Air Force Tu-154 crash which killed 96 officials and intellectuals on 10 April.
Amharic Sentence: ፖላንድ ኤፕሪል 10 ቀን 96 ባለሥልጣናትን እና ምሁራንን ከገደለው የ 2010 የፖላንድ አየር ኃይል ቱ -154 አደጋ የበረራ መረጃ መቅረጫዎችን ግልባጭ ለህትመት አበቃች።

English Sentence: America's Obama administration warns that BP's oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico could continue until August.

English Sentence: Two North Koreans are jailed in South Korea over an assassination plot on a high-ranking North Korean defector, Hwang Jang-yop.

English Sentence: An estimated 52,000 people took part in anti-government protests in the former British colony of Hong Kong.

English Sentence: Fossils discovered at the Franceville site in Gabon are claimed to be evidence that multicellular life on Earth began at least 1.5 billion years earlier than currently reckoned.

English Sentence: Astronomers confirm the first-ever direct picture of an extrasolar planet orbiting its star.

English Sentence: Politicians in Nepal fail to elect a new Prime Minister for the third time after no candidate secured a majority.

English Sentence: A Greek truck drivers strike ends with the situation expected to get back to normal quickly.

English Sentence: President of Mexico Felipe Calderón calls for a debate on the legalization of drugs.
Amharic Sentence: የሜክሲኮው ፕሬዚደንት ፍሊፔ ካልዴሮን በእፆች ህጋዊነት ላይ ክርክር እንዲደረግ ጥሪ አቀረቡ።

English Sentence: Elena Kagan is sworn in as the fourth woman to sit on the Supreme Court of the United States.

English Sentence: Wendy Chapman, the doctor at the centre of the Bloodgate rugby union scandal, is summoned to a disciplinary hearing on 23 August.
Amharic Sentence: በብለድጌት ራግቢ ህብረት ቅሌት መሃል ያለችው ዶክተር ዌንዲ ቻፕማን ነሐሴ 23 ላይ ወደ ዲሲፕሊን ችሎት ተጠርታለች።

English Sentence: Turkey sets up a commission of Turkish officials and bureaucrats to investigate May's Gaza flotilla raid.

English Sentence: President of the United States Barack Obama signs a bill increasing security along his country's border with Mexico.
Amharic Sentence: የአሜሪካው ፕሬዝዳንት ባራክ ኦባማ ሀገራቸው ከሜክሲኮ ጋር በምትዋሰንበት ድንበር ላይ ደህንነትን የሚያጠናክር ረቂቅ ሰነድ ተፈራረሙ።

English Sentence: The Independent Democrats and Democratic Alliance opposition parties in South Africa agree to merge against the ruling African National Congress.

Amharic Sentence: በመጋቢት ወር በሳና ውስጥ ሃምሳ ሁለት ተቃዋሚዎች ላይ በመተኮስ ተጠያቂ ናቸው የተባሉት አስራ አራት ሰዎች ወደ የመንግስት አቃቤ ህግ ተላኩ።

English Sentence: British prime minister David Cameron sets out to block his predecessor Gordon Brown's attempt to take the £270,000 per year role of head of the International Monetary Fund (IMF).
Amharic Sentence: የብሪታንያ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ዴቪድ ካሜሮን የቀድሞው ጆርደን ብራውን ከ የዓለም አቀፉ የገንዘብ ድርጅት (አይኤምኤፍ) በዓመት 270,000 ፓውንድ ለመውሰድ ያረጉትን ጥረት ለመግታት አቅደዋል።

English Sentence: New Jersey's Secretary of State rejects former Olympic medallist Carl Lewis's bid to run for the state Senate due to eligibility requirements.
Amharic Sentence: የኒው ጀርሲው ፀሃፊ ቀድሞ የኦሎምፒክ ሜዳሊያ ባለቤት የሆነውን የካርል ሌዊድን ለግዛቷ ሴኔት የመወዳደር ፍላጎት ከብቃት መስፈርቶች አለመሟላት ጋር በተያያዘ በውድቅ አደረጉ።

English Sentence: The Vatican brings Pope John Paul II's coffin out from below St. Peter's Basilica in Rome in preparation for his beatification.
Amharic Sentence: ቫቲካን የፖፕ ጆን ፓወለን ሬሳ ለቅድስና ለማዘጋጀት ከታችኛው ቅዱስ ጴጥሮስ ባሲልካ እንዲወጣ አዘዘ።

English Sentence: Gaddafi has supplied Viagra to his forces to encourage them to commit mass rape, Susan Rice, United States Ambassador to the United Nations, has alleged.
Amharic Sentence: ጋዳፊ በጅምላ አስገድዶ መድፈር እንዲፈጽሙ ለማበረታታት ቪያግራን ለሠራዊቱ አቅርቧል የሚል ክስ በተባበሩት መንግስታት የአሜሪካ አምባሳደር ሱዛን ራይስ ቀርቧል።

English Sentence: American basketball player Derrick Rose of the Chicago Bulls wins the NBA Most Valuable Player Award Award for the 2010-11 NBA season, the youngest player to do so.
Amharic Sentence: የአሜሪካው እና የቸሂካጎ ቡልስ ቅርጫት ኳስ ተጫዋች የሆነው ዴሪክ ሮስ በኤንቢኤ 2010-11 የውድድር አመት ምርጡ ተጫዋች በመበል ተሸለመ፤ በታሪክም በእድሜ ትንሹ ተጫዋች ያደርገዋል።

English Sentence: Workers enter one of the buildings at Japan's Fukushima I Nuclear Power Plant for the first time since an explosion in the days following the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami.
Amharic Sentence: በ 2011 ቱሆኩ የመሬት መንቀጥቀጥ እና ሱናሚ በተከሰተ ቀናት ውስጥ ፍንዳታ ከተከሰተ በኋላ በጃፓን ፉኩሺማ 1 የኑክሌር ኃይል ማመንጫ ጣቢያ ውስጥ ሠራተኞች ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ወደ አንዱ ሕንፃ ገቡ።

English Sentence: Scottish Liberal Democrat leader Tavish Scott resigns after a collapse of his party's support at the Scottish Parliament election.
Amharic Sentence: የስኮትላንዱ ሊበራል ዲሞክራቲክ ፓርቲ መሪ የነበረው ትራቪሽ ሰኮት ፓርቲው በፓርላማው የሚያገኘው ድጋፍ በመክሰሙ ምክንያት ከስራው በራሱ ፍቃድ መነሳቱን አስታወቀ።

English Sentence: There is a near riot in the Beijing Apple Store as the Apple iPad 2 goes on sale in the People's Republic of China.
Amharic Sentence: በቻይና ቤጂንግ አፕል ሱቅ የአፕል አይፓድ 2 ሽያጭ መጀመርን ተከትሎ ለረብሻ የተጠጋ ሁኔታ ተፈጠረ።

English Sentence: Floods in Mississippi worsen, with the Army Corps of Engineers saying an area between Simmesport, Louisiana and Baton Rouge may be inundated under 20-30 feet of water.
Amharic Sentence: የጦር ሰራዊቱ መሐንዲሶች በሲምስፖርት ፣ ሉዊዚያና እና ባቶን ሩዥ መካከል ያለው ቦታ ከ20-30 ጫማ በሆነ ውሃ ሊጥለቀለቅ ይችላል በማለታቸው በሚሲሲፒ ውስጥ የተከሰተው የጎርፍ መጥለቅለቅ እየተባባሰ ይሄዳል።

English Sentence: Former Football Association chairman David Triesman alleges that four members of FIFA sought "bribes" in return for backing England's failed bid to host the 2018 World Cup.
Amharic Sentence: የቀድሞ የእግርኳስ አሶሴሽን ሊቀመንበር የነበሩት ዴቪድ ትሬስማን አራት የፊፋ አባለት እንግሊዘን የ2018 አለም ዋንጫ እንድታዘጋጅ ድጋፍ እንዲሰጡ በሚል ጉቦ ለመስጠት ሙከራ እንደተረገ ደርሰንበታል አሉ።

English Sentence: Police in South London launch a murder hunt after a 15-year-old schoolboy is stabbed to death in the street.
Amharic Sentence: የ 15 ዓመቱ ተማሪ በመንገድ ላይ በጩቤ ተወግቶ ከተገደለ በኋላ የደቡብ ለንደን ፖሊስ የገዳይ አሰሳ ጀመረ።

English Sentence: North Korean leader Kim Jong-il's youngest son Kim Jong-un reportedly lifts restrictions on women's fashion, while cosmetic surgery–though illegal–takes place in return for bribes.
Amharic Sentence: የሰሜን ኮሪያው መሪ ኪም ጆንግ-ኢል ትንሹ ልጅ ኪም ጆንግ-ኡን በሴቶች ፋሽን ላይ ገደቦችን የነሳ ቢሆንም ፣ የመዋቢያ ቀዶ ጥገና ግን ሕገ ወጥ ነው፤ ሆኖም ጉቦ በመስጠት አሁንም እየተከናወነ ይገኛል።

English Sentence: President of the United States Barack Obama uses his weekly address to vow to seek oil in Alaska and in the Gulf of Mexico.
Amharic Sentence: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ፕሬዝዳንት የሆኑት ባራክ ኦባማ በሳምንታዊ መግለጫቸው በአላስካ እና በሜክስኮ ባህረ ሰላጤ የነዳጅ ፍለጋ እንደሚደረግ ቃል ገቡ።

English Sentence: The Morganza Spillway on the Mississippi River has been opened for the first time in 37 years, deliberately flooding 3,000 square miles of rural Louisiana to save most of Baton Rouge and New Orleans.
Amharic Sentence: በሚሲሲፒ ወንዝ ላይ የሚገኘዉ የሞርጋንዛ ማስተንፈሻ ከ37 አመት ብኋላ ለምጀምሪያ ጊዜ ተከፍቷል፤ በዚህም አብዛኛውን የባተን ራውጅ እና ኒው ኦርሊያንሰ ለማትረፍ ሲባል 3000 ካሬ የሚሆን የሉዪዚያና ገጠራማ ቦታ በጎረፍ እንዲጥለቀለቅ ተደርጓል።

English Sentence: Protesting indigenous people take over half of the city of Puno in south-eastern Peru, demanding an end to a Canadian mining project.
Amharic Sentence: በደቡብ ምስራቃዊ ፔሩ በፑኖ ከተማ በካናዳ ዜጎች ባለቤትነት የተያዘውን የማእድን ማውጫ ፕሮጀክት በመቃወሞ የአገሬው ተወላጆች ተቃውሞ አደረጉ።

English Sentence: Iran denies a plane carrying the Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel access to its airspace for two hours en route to India.
Amharic Sentence: የጀርመን ቻንስለር አንጄላ ሜርክልን የጫነን አውሮፕላን ኢራን ወደ ህንድ የሚወስደውን የአየር ክልሏን ለሁለት ሰዓታት ያህል እንዳይጠቀም ከለከለች።

English Sentence: The Dallas Mavericks beat the Miami Heat 95-93 in the second game of the 2011 NBA Finals to tie the series.
Amharic Sentence: በ2011 የሁለተኛው ኤንቢኤ የፍፃሜ ጨዋታ የዳላስ ማቭሪኮች የማያሚ ሂቶችን 95-93 በሆነ ውጤት ረቱ።

English Sentence: Cheaper new meningitis vaccinations reduce cases in Africa, with Burkina Faso, Mali and Niger recording the lowest number of cases.
Amharic Sentence: አዲስ እና በዋጋቸው ርካሽ የሆነ የማጅራት ገትር በሽታ ክትባት በአፍሪካ ያለውን የበሽተኞች ቁጥር እንዲቀንስ እንደውም በ ቡርኪና ፋሶ፣ በማሊ እና በኒጀር በከፍተኛ መልኩ እንዲወርድ አደረገ።

English Sentence: Ash clouds from the erupting Puyehue-Cordon Caulle in Chile disrupt and cancel international flights, leaving thousands stranded.
Amharic Sentence: እየፈነዳ ካለው የቺሊው ፑዬሁ_ ኮርደን ካውል እሳተ ጎመራ የሚነሳው ከፍተኛ የአቧራ ብናኝ አለምአቀፍ በረራዎችን ሲያስተጓጉል፤ በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ሰዎችን ደግሞ መንቀሳቀስ እንዳይችሉ አድርጓል።

English Sentence: A series of moderate magnitude 4-5 earthquakes hit eastern Eritrea, preceding reports of a possible volcanic eruption.
Amharic Sentence: እሳተ ገሞራ ፍንዳታ ሊፈጠር ይችላል ከሚለው ዘገባ በፊት ተከታታይ የሆነ መጠነኛ ከ4-5 መጠን ያለው የመሬት መንቀጥቀጦ በምሥራቅ ኤርትራ ተከሰተ።

English Sentence: Liberia suspends diplomatic ties with Libya, after United States Secretary of State Hillary Clinton called on countries to sever ties with Libya.
Amharic Sentence: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስትር ሂላሪ ክሊንተን አገራት ከሊቢያ ጋር ግንኙነታቸውን እንዲያቋርጡ ከጠየቁ በኋላ ላይቤሪያ ከሊቢያ ጋር ያላትን ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ግንኙነት አቋርጣለች።

English Sentence: Some Saudi Arabian women challenge a ban on female drivers, posting accounts and pictures of themselves driving automobiles.
Amharic Sentence: አንዳንድ የሳውዲ አረቢያ ሴቶች በሃገሪቱ ሴቶች እንዳያሽከረከሩ የተጣለውን እገዳ በመቃወም እየነዱ የሚያሳዩ ፎቶዎችን በመልቀቅ ላይ ይገኛሉ።

English Sentence: The International Monetary Fund calls on eurozone countries to provide more money for Greece and to stop what the IMF regards as "unproductive" arguments about burning bondholders.
Amharic Sentence: የአለም አቀፉ የገንዘብ ድርጅት የአውሮፓ ዞን ሀገራት ለ ግሪክ ገንዘብ እንዲሰጡ እንዲሁም ደግሞ ውጤታ አልባ ነው ብሎ ያስቀመጠውን የቦንድ ባለቤቶችን የማፍረስ ክርክር እንዲያቆሙ ጥሪ አቀረበ።

English Sentence: A Syrian military spokesman says more than 400 members of security forces have been killed in the months-long unrest as videos surface allegedly showing children killed in the violence.
Amharic Sentence: በዓመፅ ውስጥ የተገደሉ ሕፃናትን የሚያሳዩ ቪዲዮዎች ከተለቀቁ በኋላ በረጅም ወራት ውስጥ በተፈጠረው አለመረጋጋት ከ አራት መቶ በላይ የፀጥታ ኃይሎች አባላት መገደላቸውን የሶሪያ ወታደራዊ ቃል አቀባይ ገለፁ።

English Sentence: Israeli Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu says that Israel is "fully entitled to work against" attempts by the Gaza-bound "provocation flotilla" to smuggle arms into the Hamas-controlled Gaza Strip.

Amharic Sentence: የአኒስተን ኬሚካል እንቅስቃሴ የመጨረሻውን የመስተርድ ጋዝ የጥይት ፈንጂዎችን ማስወገድ በኬሚካል የጦር መሣሪያ ስምምነት መሠረት ከተዘጉ ከዘጠኝ የአሜሪካ የኬሚካል የጦር መሣሪያ መጋዘኖች አምስተኛው ሆኗል።

English Sentence: Former television journalist Shelly Yachimovich is elected as the head of the Israeli Labor Party.
Amharic Sentence: የቀድሞ የቴሌቪዥን ጋዜጠኛ የነበረችው ሼሊ ያቺሞቪች የእስራኤል ሰራተኞች ፓርቲ መሪ በመሆን ተመረጠች።

English Sentence: Oswald Grübel, chief executive of Swiss bank UBS, resigns in the wake of a rogue trading scandal.
Amharic Sentence: የስዊስ ባንክ የስራ አስፈፃሚ የሆኑት ኦስዋል ግሩቤል ከተጭበረበረ ግብይት ጋር በተያያዘ በገቡበት ቅሌት ከስራቸው ለቀቁ።

English Sentence: A US court sentences two more Somali pirates to life in prison for capturing a yacht off the coast of Africa in February.
Amharic Sentence: በየካቲት ወር ከአፍሪካ የባሕር ዳርቻ ጀልባን በመጥለፋቸው ሁለት ተጨማሪ የሶማሊያ ወንበዴዎችን የአሜሪካ ፍርድ ቤት በእድሜ ልክ እስራት ቀጣ።

English Sentence: At least 25 people are killed and many more injured after protesters and security forces clash in the Egyptian capital of Cairo, during a protest in response to an attack on a Coptic church.
Amharic Sentence: በግብፅ ዋና ከተማ ካይሮ ውስጥ በኮፕቲክ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ላይ ለተፈጸመው ጥቃት ምላሽ ለመስጠት በተቃውሞ ሰልፍ ወቅት በተቃዋሚዎች እና የፀጥታ ኃይሎች መካከል በተፈጠረው ግጭት ምክንያት ቢያንስ ሀያ አምስት ሰዎች ተገድለዋል ብዙዎችም ቆስለዋል።

English Sentence: A measure to support expansion of the eurozone bailout fund is halted due to its failure to pass in the Parliament of Slovakia.
Amharic Sentence: በስሎቫኪያ ፓርላማ መፅደቅ ባለመቻሉ የዩሮ ዞን የማገገሚያ ፈንድ መስፋፋትን የሚደግፍ እርምጃ ቆሟል።

English Sentence: The Netherlands becomes the first European country to win a professional world baseball championship since 1938, after defeating Cuba 2-1 in the 2011 Baseball World Cup final in Panama City, Panama.
Amharic Sentence: ኔዘርላንድ በ ፓናማ ሲቲ ፓናማ በ 2011 የቤዝቦል የዓለም ዋንጫ ፍጻሜ ኩባን 2-1 በማሸነፍ ከ 1938 ጀምሮ በፕሮፌሽናል የዓለም ቤዝቦል ሻምፒዮና አሸናፊ የሆነች የመጀመሪያዋ የአውሮፓ አገር ሆናለች።

English Sentence: Egypt's ruling Supreme Council of the Armed Forces announces a law banning all forms of discrimination, in the wake of recent violence between Coptic protesters and security forces.
Amharic Sentence: የግብፅ ጦር ሃይሎች ከፍተኛ ጠቅላይ ምክር ቤት በቅርቡ በተከሰተው በፀጥታው ሃይሎች እና በኮፕቲክ ተቃዋሚዎች ቀውስ ምክንያት ማንኛውንም አድሎን የሚከለክል አዲስ ህግ እንዳወጣ አስታወቀ።

English Sentence: Year-over-year GDP growth in the People's Republic of China slows to 9.1% for the third quarter of 2011, following government efforts to curb inflation.
Amharic Sentence: የቻይና መንግስት እየወሰደ ባለው የዋጋ ግሽበትን የማስተካከል እርምጃ ከአመት ወደ አመት የሚታየው የምጣኔ ሀበት እድገት ተቀዛቅዞ በ2011 ሦስተኛው ሩበ አመት ላይ 9.1% ደረሰ።

English Sentence: North Korea agrees, for the first time in 6 years, to let the United States search for the remains of American soldiers killed during the Korean War.
Amharic Sentence: ሰሜን ኮሪያ አሜሪካ በኮሪያ ጦርነት ወቅት የሞቱባትን ወታደሮች ለመፈለግ ያቀረበችውን ጥያቄ በ 6 አመታት ውስጥ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ፈቀደች።

English Sentence: 24-year-old Italian motorcycle racer Marco Simoncelli dies after crashing and being hit by two other riders at the Malaysian MotoGP, leading to the cancellation of the race. ,
Amharic Sentence: የ 24 ዓመቱ ጣሊያናዊ የሞተር ሳይክል ተወዳዳሪ ማርኮ ሲሞንሴሊ በማሌዥያው ሞቶጂፒ ላይ ወድቆ በሁለት ሌሎች ተወዳዳሪዎች በመገጨቱ የሞተ ሲሆን ውድድሩም በዚህ ምክንያት ተሰርዟል።

English Sentence: The corpses of 53 pro-Muammar Gaddafi fighters are found in Sirte, all having apparently been summarily executed by NTC troops.
Amharic Sentence: በ ኤንቲሲ ወታደሮች የተገደሉ 53 የሙአመር ጋዳፊ ተዋጊዎች ሬሳ በስርጥ ተገኘ።

English Sentence: Hurricane Rina strengthens to Category 2 strength as it advances towards Cancun and other resorts on the Mexican Riviera.
Amharic Sentence: አውሎ ነፋስ ሪና ወደ ካንኩን እና ሌሎች የሜክሲኮ ሪቪዬራ የመዝናኛ ሥፍራዎች እየተጠጋ ሲሄድ ወደ ደረጃ 2 አውሎ ነፋስነት ይጠነክራል።

English Sentence: In California, Oakland police disperse Occupy Oakland protesters, using tear gas and rubber bullets and making numerous arrests.
Amharic Sentence: በካሊፎርንያ ኦክላንደ በኦክላንድ የነበሩ ተቃዋዎችን የኦክላንድ ፖሊስ በአስለቃሽ ጭስ እና በጎማ ጥይቶች ተጥቅሞ የበተነ ሲሆን የተወሰኑ ሰወችንም በቁጥጥር ስር እንዳዋለ አስታወቀ።

English Sentence: Iranian actress Marzieh Vafamehr is released from jail after her sentence for acting in the banned film My Tehran for Sale is reduced.
Amharic Sentence: ኢራናዊቷ ተዋናይ ማርዚህ ቫፋሜር በታገደው የእኔ ቴህራን ለሽያጭ በተሰኘው ፊልም ላይ በመተወኗ የተጣለባት እስር ቅጣት ከተቀነሰ በኋላ ከእስር ተለቀቀች።

English Sentence: A rogue member of the Afghan National Army opens fire on Australian Army soldiers in Kandahar Province killing three and an Afghan interpreter.
Amharic Sentence: በካንዳሃር አፍጋኒሳታን አንድ እብሪተኛ የአፍጋኒስታን ብሄራዊ ጦር አባልበ ሶስት የአውስትራሊያ ወታደሮች እና አስተርጓሚ ገደለ።

English Sentence: The Australian airline Qantas grounds its entire fleet due to an ongoing industrial dispute with a lockout to start on Monday.
Amharic Sentence: የአውስትራሊያው ካንታስ አየር መንገድ ሁሉንም በረራዎቹን እየተደረገ ባለው ክርክር እና ሰኞ ይጀመራል በተባለው አድማ ምክንያት እንዳገደ አስታወቀ።

English Sentence: Almazbek Atambayev, the newly elected President of Kyrgyzstan, states that a lease for a United States air base in Manas will not be renewed when it expires in 2014.
Amharic Sentence: አዲስ የተመረጡት የኪርጊስታን ፕሬዝዳንት አልማዝቤክ አታምዬቭ በማናስ ለሚገኘው የአሜሪካ አየር ማረፊያ ኪራይ እ.ኤ.አ በ 2014 ዓ.ም ሲያልቅ እንደማይታደስ ገልጸዋል ።

English Sentence: The Islamist terrorist group Boko Haram claims responsibility for a series of bomb and gun attacks in the north-eastern Nigerian town of Damaturu that have killed at least 63 people.
Amharic Sentence: በሰሜን ምስራቃዊ ናይጄሪያ በምትገኘው ዳማቱሩ ከተማ ለተደረጉ እና በትንሹ ለ63 ሰዎች ሞት ምክንያት ለሆኑ የቦምብ እና የመሰራያ ጥቃቶች ሃላፊኑን እስላማዊው አሸባሪ ቦኮ ሃራም እንደሚወስድ አስታወቀ።

English Sentence: Flooding in Thailand reaches the residence of the Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra in Bangkok, forcing her to withdraw from the Hawaii APEC summit to deal with the crisis.
Amharic Sentence: በታይላንድ የጎርፍ መጥለቅለቅ ባንኮክ ውስጥ ወደሚገኘው የጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ይንግላክ ሺናዋራ መኖሪያ መድረሱን አስመልክቶ ቀውሱን ለመፍታት በሃዋይ በተካደው የእስያ-ፓሲፊክ ኢኮኖሚያዊ ትብብር (ኤፒኢሲ) ጉባኤ አቋርጠው እንዲሄዱ አስገድዷል።

English Sentence: A Scottish-designed bionic leg exoskeleton, designed to allow handicapped people to walk, is approved for sale in the United Kingdom.
Amharic Sentence: በስኮትላንዶች የተሰራውና አካል ጉዳተኛ ሰዎች እንዲራመዱ የሚያስችለው ኤክዞስኬለተን የተሰኘው አርቲፊሻል እግር በእንግሊዝ ውስጥ ለገበያ እንዲቀርብ ፍቃድ አገኘ።

English Sentence: London in the United Kingdom wins the rights to host the 2017 World Athletics Championships ahead of Doha, Qatar.
Amharic Sentence: በእንግሊዝ የምትገኘው ለንደን ከኳታር ዶሃ ቀድማ የ2017 የአለም አትሌቲክስ ሻምፒዮና የማስተናገድ መብት አገኘች።

English Sentence: In Major League Baseball, the Florida Marlins officially change their name to the Miami Marlins.
Amharic Sentence: በሜጀር ሊግ ሶከር፤ ፍሎሪዳ ማረሊንስ ስማቸውን ወደ ማያሚ ማርሊንስ መቀየራቸውን በይፋ አስታወቁ።

English Sentence: Former South African rugby union player Solly Tyibilika is shot dead in a bar in Cape Town.
Amharic Sentence: የቀድሞው የደቡብ አፍሪካ ራግቢ ህብረት ተጫዋች ሶሊ ታይቢሊካ በኬፕ ታውን መጠጥ ቤት ውስጥ በጥይት ተገደለ።

English Sentence: Uzbek midfielder Server Djeparov is named Asian Footballer of the Year for the second time, in a ceremony held at the Asian Football Confederation headquarters.
Amharic Sentence: የኡዝቤኩ የመሃል ክፍል ተጫዋች ሰርቨር ጄፓሮቭ በኤዥያ እግርኳስ ኮንፌደሬሽን መቀመጫ በተደረገ ዝግጅት ለሁለተኛ ጊዜ የኤዥያ የአመቱ ምርጥ ተጫዋች ተባለ።

English Sentence: India's government decides to relax rules concerning the operation of foreign-owned retailers such as Wal-Mart and Tesco within India.
Amharic Sentence: የህንድ መንግስት በውጪ ዜጎች ባለቤትነት የተያዙ እና በችርቻሮ ንግድ ዘርፍ ላይ ለተሰማሩ እንደ ዎል-ማርት እና ቴስኮ ላሉ በሃገሪቱ ውስጥ ለተሰማሩ ድርጅቶች ህግ እና ደንቦቹን ለማላላት ወሰነ።

English Sentence: NBA team owners and players reach an agreement to end the 149-day NBA lockout and to begin the current NBA season on Christmas Day.
Amharic Sentence: የ ኤንቢኤ ቡድን ባለቤቶች እና ተጫዋቾች የ149 ቀናት ኤንቢኤ መቋለጥን ለማቆም እና የአሁኑን የኤንቢኤ ወቅትን በገና ቀን ለመጀመር ስምምነት ላይ ደርሰዋል።

English Sentence: David Cameron, the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, refuses to join a European Union financial crisis accord after negotiations in Brussels.
Amharic Sentence: የእንግሊዙ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር ዴቪድ ካሜሩን በብራሰልስ በተደረገው ድርድር በአውሮፓ ህብረት ስለተከሰተው የፋይናንስ ቀውስ እንዲወያዩ የቀረበላቸውን ጥያቄ ውድቅ አደረጉ።

English Sentence: The United States Senate votes in favor of extending the payroll tax cut for two months.
Amharic Sentence: የአሜሪካ ሴኔት የደሞዝ ክፍያ ቁርጥ ግብርን ቀንን ለሁለት ወር ለማራዘም መረጠ።

English Sentence: The Arab League threatens to take Syria to the United Nations within two weeks if the country does not accept its proposals to end the crackdown on the uprising.
Amharic Sentence: የዓረብ ሊግ አገሪቱ በአመፁ ላይ የሚደረገውን ዕርምጃ ለማቆም ያቀረበችውን ሀሳብ ካልተቀበለች ሶሪያን ወደ የተባበሩት መንግሥታት ድርጅት በሁለት ሳምንታት ውስጥ እንደምታቀርብ አስፈራራች።

English Sentence: The Buddha Memorial Center of Fo Guang Shan in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, housing a tooth relic of Gautama Buddha, is consecrated.
Amharic Sentence: በታይወን ካሆሲውንግ የሚገኘው የጋውታማ ቡድሃ ጥርስ ቅርስ የሚገኝበት የፎጉንግ የቡድሃ መታሰቢያ ማእከል የተቀደሰ ስፍራ ነው።

English Sentence: The Washington-based organisation Human Rights Watch accuses Syria of hiding hundreds of political detainees during a visit by Arab League monitors.
Amharic Sentence: መቀመጫውን በዋሽንግተን ያደረገው የሰብዓዊ መብቶች ጠባቂ በአረብ ሊግ ተቆጣጣሪዎች ጉብኝት ወቅት ሶሪያን በመቶዎች የሚቆጠሩ የፖለቲካ እስረኞችን ደብቃለች በማለት ክስ አቅርቧል።

English Sentence: At least two people are killed in attacks on bars in northern Kenya near the border with Somalia, with Islamist al-Shabaab militants possibly responsible.
Amharic Sentence: እስላማዊው አልሸባብ ፈፅሞታል ተብሎ በተገመተው እና በሰሜናዊ ኬንያ በሚገኘው የሶማሌያ ድንበር አካባቢ በሚገኙ መጠጥ ቤቶች ላይ ባነጣጠረው ጥቃት በትንሹ ሁለት ሰዎች ተገደሉ።

English Sentence: Up to 50,000 people flee their homes in a border area of South Sudan amid ethnic violence.
Amharic Sentence: በደቡብ ሱዳን ድንበር አካባቢ እስከ 50,000 ሺህ የሚደርሱ ሰዎች በጎሳ ግጭት ምክንያት ቤታቸውን ጥለው ተሰደዋል።

English Sentence: Armed commandos will be ordered to protect endangered tigers in India's Bandipur and Nagarhole national parks.
Amharic Sentence: በህንድ ባንዲፑር እና ናጋርሆል ብሄራዊ ፓርክች ውስጥ ለሚገኙ እና ዝርያቸው አደጋ ላይ ላሉ ነብሮች ታጣቂ ኮማንዶዎች ጥበቃ እንዲያደርጉላቸው ሊደረግ ነው።

English Sentence: Alabama defeats LSU 21-0 to win the 2012 BCS National Championship, their second championship in three years, in the first shutout in BCS bowl history.
Amharic Sentence: በ2012 በተደረገው በመጀመሪያው የ ቢኤስሲ ቦውል ታሪክ ቢሲኤስ ሻምፒዮና አላባማ ቡድን የኤል ኤስዩን ቡድን 21-0 በሆነ ውጤት አሸነፈ፤ ይህም በሁለት አመት ውስጥ ሁለት ያሸነፈ ቡድን ያደርገዋል።

English Sentence: The English Wikipedia will be shut down on Wednesday in protest against anti-piracy legislation proposed by the United States Congress.
Amharic Sentence: እረቡእ ላይ ከተለያዩ የቅጂ ህጎች ጋር በተያያዘ በአሜሪካ መማክርት ጉባኤ የወጣውን ህግ በመቃወም የእንጊሊዘኛው ዊኪፔዲያ ከአገልግሎት ውጪ ይሆናል።

English Sentence: Twitter alters technology to enable country-specific censorship of messages.
Amharic Sentence: ትዊተር በሃገሮች ላይ የሚመሰረትን የመልእክት መቆጣጠሪያ ቴክኖሎጂ ከአገልግሎቱ አስወገደ።

English Sentence: Archbishop of York Dr. John Sentamu calls on the Church of England not to permit same-sex marriage.
Amharic Sentence: የዮርክ ሊቀ ጳጳስ ዶ / ር ጆን ሴንታሙ የእንግሊዝ ቤተክርስቲያን የተመሳሳይ ጾታ ጋብቻ እንዳይፈቅድ ጥሪ አቀረቡ።

English Sentence: The People's Republic of China asks for assistance from South Sudan to obtain the release of 29 Chinese workers held captive in Sudan for five days.
Amharic Sentence: የቻይና ሕዝባዊ ሪፐብሊክ በሱዳን ተይዘው ለአምስት ቀናት የታሰሩ ሃያ ዘጠኝ የቻይና ሠራተኞች እንዲለቀቁ ከደቡብ ሱዳን እርዳታ ጠየቀች።

English Sentence: The Daily Mail reports that the world record for the number of water skiers pulled by a single boat (145) has been broken.
Amharic Sentence: በአንድ ጀልባ የተጎተቱ የውሃ ተንሸራታቾች ብዛት(145) የዓለም ሪከርድ መሰበሩን ዴይሊ ሜይል ዘግቧል።

English Sentence: A Libyan starts court proceedings against 41 people accused of helping Muammar Gaddafi to attempt to suppress the opposition in the Libyan Civil War.
Amharic Sentence: ሙአመር ጋዳፊን በሊቢያ የእርስ በእርስ ጦርነት ውስጥ ተቃዋሚዎችን ለማፈን ያደረጉትን ሙከራ ደግፈዋል ተብለው በተጠረጠሩ 41 ሰዎች ላይ ሊቢያ የፍርድ ሂደትን ጀምራለች።

English Sentence: The United States Congress votes to pass legislation allowing for greater use of drone aircraft in the United States.
Amharic Sentence: የአሜሪካው ኮንግረስ በአሜሪካ ውስጥ ሰው አልባ አውሮፕላኖችን መጠቀም የሚያስችለውን አዲስ ህግ አፀደቀ።

English Sentence: Azerbaijan rejects a claim by Iran that it has been helping Israeli spies in the killing of an Iranian nuclear scientist.
Amharic Sentence: አዘርባጃን ከኢራን የተነሳባትን እና የእስራኤል ሰላዮችን በመደገፍ የኢራኑን የኒውክለር ተመራማሪ አስገድላለች የሚል ክስ እንደማትቀበለው ገለፀች።

English Sentence: The President of Honduras Porfirio Lobo pledges a "full and transparent inquiry" into the events and suspends local and national prison officials.
Amharic Sentence: የሆንዱራስ ፕሬዝዳንት ፖርፊሪዮ ሎቦ በክስተቶቹ ላይ “ሙሉ እና ግልፅ ምርመራ” ቃል ገብተው የአካባቢ እና የብሔራዊ እስር ቤት ኃላፊዎችን አግደዋል።

English Sentence: United States Capitol Police and the Federal Bureau of Investigation arrested Amine El Khalifi, a man from Morocco who allegedly planned a suicide attack on the United States Capitol.
Amharic Sentence: በአሜሪካ መንገስት መቀመጫ ላይ የአጥፍቶ ጥፋት ሊፈፅም የነበረ የተባለ እና ሞረኮዋዊ ዜግነት ያለው አሚን ኤል ካሊፊ በካፒቶል ፖሊስ እና የፌደራል የምርመራ ቢሮ(FBI) ቁጥጥር ስር ዋለ።

English Sentence: A fight amongst inmates leads to a prison riot in the Mexican city of Apodaca, Nuevo León, with 44 people dead.
Amharic Sentence: በአፖካዳ ሜክሲኮ እስር ቤት ውስጥ በተፈጠረ ፀብ ምክንያት በተፈጠረ ግጭት 44 ሰዎች ህይወታቸው አለፈ።

English Sentence: Treasure from the Spanish Navy frigate Nuestra Señora de las Mercedes returns to Spain after being recovered by Odyssey Marine Exploration in 2007.
Amharic Sentence: በ2007 በተደረገ የኦዲሴ የመርከብ አሰሳ በ|ላ በተገኘው የስፔን የጦር መርከብ ኑሰትራ ሲኖራ ዴ ላስ መርሰደስ ውስጥ ይገኝ የነበረ ማእድን እና ውድ ሃብት ወደ ስፔን እንዲመለስ ተደረገ።

English Sentence: Meta-analysis of 42 previous studies concludes chocolate may be good for the heart.
Amharic Sentence: ባለፉት በተደረጉት 42 ጥናቶች ቸኮሌት ለልብ ጤና ጠቃሚ ሊሆን እንደሚችል ማሳየት ችለዋል።

English Sentence: The United States files an application in New Zealand to extradite Kim Dotcom and three of his associates in MegaUpload to face charges of breaching copyright.
Amharic Sentence: አሜሪካ ኪም ዶትኮምን እና ሶስት ግብረ አበሮቹን በሜጋ አፕሎድ እና የቅጂ መብቶችን ጥሰዋል በሚል አሳልፋ እንድትሰጣት ኒው ዘላንድን ጠየቀች።

English Sentence: A study finds a correlation between snoring as a toddler and behavior problems later in childhood.
Amharic Sentence: አንድ ጥናት በህፃነት እድሜ ማንኮራፋት እና በታዳጊነት እድሜ ላይ በሚታዩ የባህሪ ችግሮች መካከል ግንኙነትን መኖሩን አገኘ።

English Sentence: Turkish Airlines begins a service to Somalia, the first regular service to the capital Mogadishu except regional East African flights to operate in twenty years.
Amharic Sentence: የቱርክ አየር መንገድ ወደ ክልላዊ የምስራቅ አፍሪካ ብቻ ሲያደርግ ከነበረው በረራዎች ከሃያ ዓመታት በኋላ ለሶማሊያ ዋና ከተማ ሞቃዲሾ የመጀመሪያውን መደበኛ የበረራ አገልግሎት መስጠት ጀመረ።

English Sentence: A gunman kills one person and injures seven others before himself being shot dead at the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center's Western Psychiatric Institute & Clinic in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
Amharic Sentence: በፒትስበርግ ፣ ፔንሲልቬንያ በሚገኘው የፒትስበርግ የህክምና ማዕከል የምዕራባዊ የአዕምሮ ህክምና ተቋም እና ክሊኒክ ጠመንጃ የታጠቀ ሰው በፖሊሶች ከመገደሉ በፊት የአንድ ሰው ህይወትን ሲያጠፋ ሰባት ሰዎችን አቁስሏል።

English Sentence: Chinese politician Bo Xilai speaks out for the first time since his aide attempted to defect at the American consulate.
Amharic Sentence: ቻይናዊው ፖለቲከኛ ቦ ዚላይ ረዳታቸው በአሜሪካ ቆንስላ ጽሕፈት ቤት ውስጥ ለመልቀቅ ከሞከረ በኋላ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ተናገሩ።

English Sentence: India's Kingfisher Airlines cancels at least 40 flights due to pilots not turning up for work due to unpaid salaries.
Amharic Sentence: የህንዱ ኪንግፊሸር አየርመንገድ አብራሪዎቹ ያልተከፈለን ክፍያ አለ በማለት ከስራ በመቅረታቸው ምክንያት ወደ 40 የሚጠጉ በረራዎቹን ሰረዘ።

English Sentence: Pakistani villagers find 13 bodies with bullet wounds in the Federally Administered Tribal Areas near Afghanistan as security forces step up an offensive.
Amharic Sentence: በፓኪስታን የአንድ መንደር ነዋሪዎች 13 በጥይት የቆሰሉ ሬሳዎችን በፌደራሉ ይተዳደራሉ በተባሉ የጎሳ አካባቢዎች ከ አፍጋኒስታን አቅራቢያ አገኙ።

English Sentence: Rebelling government troops in Mali storm the state broadcaster in the capital Bamako.
Amharic Sentence: በማሊ ውስጥ የመንግሥት ወታደሮች ማመፅ በዋና ከተማዋ ባማኮ ውስጥ ያለውን የመንግሥት ብሮድካስት ወረዋል።

English Sentence: Iraq is terrorised by unconfirmed reports of extremists crushing the skulls of emos with blocks of cement.
Amharic Sentence: የኢሞስን የራስ ቅል ፅንፈኞች በብሎኬት አፍርሰዋል በሚገልጹ ያልተረጋገጡ ዘገባዎች ኢራቅ ተሸብራለች።

English Sentence: The Los Angeles County Coroner's Office says that Whitney Houston's official cause of death was drowning as a result of cocaine use.
Amharic Sentence: የሎስ አንጀለስ ካውንቲ የአስክሬን ምርመራ ቢሮ ዊትኒ ሂውስተን ኮኬይን በመጠቀሟ ምክንያት ሰጥማ መሞቷን አሳውቀዋል።

English Sentence: Nine top officials are jailed for their role in the near-bankruptcy of one of Vietnam's largest state-owned companies.
Amharic Sentence: በቬትናም መንግስት ባለቤትነት የሚተዳደሩ ኩባንያዎች መካከል ትልቁ በሆነው በአንዱ ላይ ለደረሰው የብር ኪሳራ በተጫወቱት ሚና ዘጠኝ ከፍተኛ ባለስልጣናት በእስር ላይ ይገኛሉ።

English Sentence: Turkish prime minister Recep Tayyip Erdoğan accuses the United Nations Security Council of standing by with its "hands and arms tied" while the Syrian people are killed every day.
Amharic Sentence: የቱርኩ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ሬሴፕ ጣይብ ኤርዶጋን የተባበሩት መንግስታት ድርጅት የፀጥታው ምክር ቤት የሶሪያ ህዝብ በየቀኑ ሲገደል "እጁንና ክንዱን አስሮ" ቆሟል ሲሉ ከሰዋል።

English Sentence: University of Arkansas head football coach Bobby Petrino is fired because of misconduct involving an inappropriate relationship with a female employee.
Amharic Sentence: የአርካንሳስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዋና የእግር ኳስ አሰልጣኝ ቦቢ ፔትሪኖ ከሴት ሰራተኛ ጋር ተገቢ ያልሆነ ግንኙነትን በማሳየቱ ከሥራ ተባረረ።

English Sentence: Vessels from the Philippine Navy and Chinese maritime surveillance are at a standoff after the Philippines attempted to arrest Chinese fishermen in the South China Sea.
Amharic Sentence: የፊሊፒንስ ሃይሎች የቻይና አሳ አጥማጆችን በደቡባዊ የቻይና ባህር ላይ በቁጥጥር ስር ካዋሉ በ|ላ የፊሊፒንስ የባህር ሃይል እና የቻይና የባህር ሃይል ክትትል ሃይሎች ጉዳዩን በአፅንኦት ቆመው እየተከታተሉ ይገኛሉ።

English Sentence: Former Malian President Amadou Toumani Toure arrives in Senegal after being ousted in a military coup.
Amharic Sentence: የቀድሞ የማሊ ፕሬዚደንት የነበሩት አማዱ ቶማኒ ቱሬ ከወታደራዊ መፈንቅለ መንግስት ከተወገዱ በ|ላ ሴኔጋል ደረሱ።

English Sentence: Police fire tear gas at demonstrators outside the capital Manama ahead of the Grand Prix.
Amharic Sentence: ከግራንድ ፕሪክስ ፊት ከዋና ከተማዋ ማናማ ወጣ ብለው በሰልፈኞች ላይ ፖሊስ አስለቃሽ ጭስ ተኮሰ።

English Sentence: In response to an outbreak of an unidentified fatal disease in Quang Ngai province, Vietnam, the Vietnamese government asks for help from the World Health Organization.
Amharic Sentence: በቬትናም ኩአንግ ንጋይ አካባቢ በተከሰተው ያልታወቀ ገዳይ በሽታ ምክንያት የቬትናም መንግስት የአለም የጤና ድርጅትን እርዳታ ጠየቀ።

English Sentence: A 30-year-old woman collapses and dies while running in the London Marathon.
Amharic Sentence: የ 30 ዓመቷ ሴት በለንደን ማራቶን በመሮጥ ላይ ሳለች ወድቃ ህይወቷ አለፈ።

English Sentence: Burma's parliament opens without the party of Aung San Suu Kyi who boycotted the legislature over a disagreement on the wording of the oath of office.
Amharic Sentence: የቡርማ ፓረላማ በቃለ-መሃላ ቃል ባለመስማማታቸው የተነሳ ከአውንድ ሳንሱኪ ፓርቲ አባላት ውጪ ስራ ጀመረ።

English Sentence: South Korean retailers cease selling beef from the United States after a case of mad cow disease is reported.
Amharic Sentence: የደቡብ ኮሪያ ነጋዴዎች ከ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ አሜሪካ የሚመጡ የስጋ ውጤቶችን የላሞች በሽታ ሪፖርት በመደረጉ የተነሳ መሸጥ አቆሙ።

English Sentence: Malaysian police use tear gas and water cannon to disperse thousands of protesters gathered in Kuala Lumpur calling for free and fair elections.
Amharic Sentence: የማሌዢያ ፖሊስ በኩዋላ ላምፑር ነፃ እና ገለልተኛ ምርጫ በመጠየቅ በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ተቃዋሚዎች ሲያደርጉ በነበረበት ተቃውሞ ላይ አስለቃሽ ጭስ እና ውሃ በመጠቀም ተቃውሞውን በተነ።

English Sentence: The as of yet unfinished One World Trade Center becomes the tallest building in New York City, overtaking the Empire State Building.
Amharic Sentence: ገና ያላለቀው ዋን ወርልድ ንግድ ማእከል የኢምፓየር ስቴት ህንፃን በመብለጥ በኒው ዮርክ ከተማ ውስጥ ረጅሙ ሕንፃ ሆኗል።

English Sentence: Tens of thousands of people march in Asia, Europe and North America, protesting against job cuts, inequality, and austerity measures.
Amharic Sentence: በኤሽያ፣ በአውሮፓ እና በሰሜን አሜሪካ በአስር ሺህ የሚቆጠሩ ሰዎች ከስራ መፈናቀልን፣ እኩልነትን እና የኢኮኖሚ ቁጥጥሮችን በተመለከተ የተቃውሞ ሰልፍ አደረጉ።

English Sentence: United States President Barack Obama officially states that he supports the right for same-sex partners to marry.
Amharic Sentence: የአሜሪካው ፕሬዝዳንት ባራክ ኦባማ የተመሳሳይ ፆታ ጋብቻዎችን እንደሚደግፉ ገለፁ።

English Sentence: Atlético Madrid defeat Athletic Bilbao in the 2012 UEFA Europa League Final in Bucharest to win the competition for the second time in three years.
Amharic Sentence: በቡካሬስት በተደረገው የ2012 ኢውሮፓ ሊግ የፍፃሜ ጨዋታ አትሌቲኮ ማድሪድ አትሌቲኮ ቢልባኦን በማሸነፍ በሶስት አመት ውስጥ ሁለት ጊዜ ዋንጫውን ወሰደ።

English Sentence: Chinese tour companies suspend tourist flights to the Philippines amid rising tensions between the two countries over territorial disputes in the South China Sea.
Amharic Sentence: የቻይና የአስጎብኚ ድርጅቶች ወደ ፊሊፒንስ የሚደረጉ ጉዞወችን ሁለቱ አገሮች በደቡብ የቻይና ባህር ጉዳይ በመካከላቸው በተነሳው ውዝግብ ምክንያት እንዲታገድ አደረጉ።

English Sentence: A man sets himself on fire outside the Oslo courthouse where mass murderer Anders Behring Breivik is on trial for the 2011 Norway attacks.
Amharic Sentence: የጅምላ ነፍሰ ገዳይ አንደርስ ቤሪንግ ብሬቪክ በ 2011 በኖርዌይ ላደረሰው ጥቃት ፍርድ ቤት በቀረበበት የኦስሎ ፍርድ ቤት ውጭ አንድ ሰው ራሱን በእሳት አቃጠለ።

English Sentence: China Central Television Headquarters in Beijing is completed, a decade after its design by OMA.
Amharic Sentence: በቤጂንግ የሚገኘው የቻይና ሴንትራል ቴሌቪዥን ዋና መሥሪያ ቤት በኦኤምኤ ንድፉ ከተሰራ ከአሥር ዓመታት በኋላ ተጠናቀቀ።

English Sentence: Taoiseach Enda Kenny makes a televised address on the European Fiscal Compact ahead of Thursday's referendum.
Amharic Sentence: ታዎኢሰች እንዳ ኬኒ ከሃሙሱ ህዝበ ውሳኔ በፊት የአውሮፓን የበጀት ጉዳይ በሚመለከት በቴሌቪዥን በመቅረብ መግለጫ ሰጡ።

English Sentence: The mother of Assange arrives in London ahead of his final legal bid against extradition to Sweden.
Amharic Sentence: የአሳንጄ እናት አሳንጄ ወደ ሰዊድን የመተላለፍ ጥያቄውን በሚያነሳበት የመጨረሻ የፍርድ ቤት ለመከታተል ለንደን ደረሱ።

English Sentence: Viswanathan Anand defeats Boris Gelfand to win the World Chess Championship for the fourth consecutive time, and the fifth time overall.
Amharic Sentence: ቪስዋናንታን አናንድ ቦሪስ ጌልፈንድን በማሸነፍ ለተከታታይ ለአራተኛ ጊዜ የአለም የቼዝ ሻምፒዮና አሸነፈ ፣ በአጠቃላይም አምስት ግዜ አሸንፏል።

English Sentence: A plane carrying 153 people on board crashes in a residential neighborhood in Lagos, Nigeria, killing everyone on board and 10 people on the ground.
Amharic Sentence: በናይጄሪያ ሌጎስ በሚገኝ መኖሪያ ስፍራ ውስጥ 153 ሰዎችን አሳፍሮ የነበረ አንድ አውሮፕላን በመከስከሱ ሳቢያ ሁሉም ተሳፋሪዎችን ጨምሮ አስር መሬት ላይ የነበሩ ሰዎች ሞተዋል።

English Sentence: Controversy is stoked after a video emerges of a U.S. religious minister outlining his plan to imprison the country's gay and lesbian population behind an electric fence until they die.
Amharic Sentence: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የሀይማኖት ሚኒስትር የሀገሪቱን ግብረሰዶማውያን እና ሌዝቢያን ነዋሪዎችን እስኪሞቱ ድረስ በኤሌክትሪክ አጥር ጀርባ የማሰር እቅዱን ሲገልጽ የሚያሳይ ቪዲዮ ከወጣ በኋላ ውዝግብ ተቀስቅሷል።

English Sentence: The Solar Impulse, a solar plane, lands in Morocco, completing the world's first intercontinental flight powered by the Sun.
Amharic Sentence: ሶላር ኢምፐልስ የተሰኘው እና በፀሃይ ሃይል የሚሰራው አውሮፕላን በአለማችን ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ የተደረገውን የአህጉር አቀፍ በረራ በመጨረስ በሞሮኮ አረፈ።

English Sentence: U.S. Secretary of Defense Leon Panetta makes an unannounced trip to Kabul and warns that his country is "reaching the limits of our patience here" with regard to Pakistan.
Amharic Sentence: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የመከላከያ ሚኒስትር ሊዮን ፓኔትታ ወደ ካቡል ያልታሰበ ጉዞ አደረጉ፤ በዚህም ያልታሰበ ጉብኝታቸው ሀገራቸው ፓኪስታንን በተመለከተ የትዕግሥት ወሰን ጥግ ላይ እንደደረሰች አስጠንቅቀዋል።

Amharic Sentence: በቱርክ ከአማሲያ እስር ቤት ሰባት እስረኞች ጥቅምት 5 “ማብቂያው የማይታወቅ እና የማይቀለበስ” የረሃብ አድማ መጀመራቸውን እና ጤናቸው ከፍተኛ አደጋ ላይ መሆኑን ተናግረዋል።

English Sentence: Chinese author Mo Yan, famous for working in the style of writing known as hallucinatory realism, wins the Nobel Prize in Literature.
Amharic Sentence: ሃሉሲኔታሪቲ ሪልዝም በመባል በሚታወቀው የአጻጻፍ ዘይቤ በመሥራት ዝነኛ የሆነው ቻይናዊው ደራሲ ሞ ያን በስነ ጽሑፍ ዘርፍ የኖቤል ሽልማትን አሸነፈ።

English Sentence: An Africa Cup of Nations qualification match between Senegal and Ivory Coast is abandoned due to rioting at the Stade Leopold Senghor in Dakar.
Amharic Sentence: በሴኔጋል እና በአይቮሪ ኮስት መካከል የሚደረገው የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ የማጣሪያ ጨዋታ በዳካር በስታዴ ሊዮፖልድ ሴንጎር ሁከት በመነሳቱ ተትቷል።

English Sentence: Senegal are disqualified from the 2013 Africa Cup of Nations after last Saturday's stadium riot in the game with Ivory Coast.
Amharic Sentence: ሴኔጋል ባለፈው ቅዳሜ ከ አይቮሪ ኮስት ጋር ካደረገቸው ሁከት የሞላበት ጨዋታ ከ2013 የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ ተሰናበተች።

English Sentence: Big Tex, a 52-foot statue and cultural icon in Dallas, Texas, is destroyed by fire during the final weekend of the 2012 State Fair of Texas.
Amharic Sentence: በዳላስ ቴክሳስ ውስጥ የሚገኘውየባህል መገለጫ የሆነው ባለ 52 ጫማ ሐውልት ቢግ ቴክስ እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2012 የቴክሳስ ግዛት ፌስቲቫል የመጨረሻው ቅዳሜና እሁድ በተነሳው እሳት ተቃጠለ።

English Sentence: The SpaceX Dragon capsule on a re-supply mission to the International Space Station returns to Earth.
Amharic Sentence: ወደ አለም አቀፉ የህዋ ጣቢያ የድጋሚ አቅርቦት ተልእኮ ላይ የነበረው የስፔስ ኤክስ ድራገን መንኮራኩር ወደ ምደር ተመለሰ።

English Sentence: Five thousand people are evacuated from low-lying areas off the coast of Tamil Nadu state in India and two sailors die in heavy seas before Cyclone Nilam hits the coast.
Amharic Sentence: በሕንድ ውስጥ ከሚገኘው በታሚል ናዱ ግዛት የባህር ዳርቻ ዝቅተኛ ቦታዎች አምስት ሺህ ሰዎች ስፍራዎቹን ለቀው እንዲወጡ ተደርገዋል፤ እንዲሁም ሁለት መርከበኞች በሳይክሎም ኒላም አውሎ ነፋስ የባህር ዳርቻው ከመመታቱ በፊት በከባድ ማዕበሎች ሳቢያ ህይወታቸው አልፏል።

English Sentence: Former British Labour Party minister Denis MacShane resigns his House of Commons seat after he wrongfully claimed at least £7,500 in expenses.
Amharic Sentence: የቀድሞ የእንግሊዝ ሰራተኞች ፓርቲ ሚኒስተር ዴኒስ ማክሼን 7,500 ፓውንድ ወጪ እንዳደረገ እና ይገባኛል በሚል በስህተት ከጠየቀ በ|ላ ከጋራ ምክር ቤቱ መቀመጫ ተነሳ።

English Sentence: Bishop Tawadros is selected as the new 118th pope of the Coptic Orthodox Church.
Amharic Sentence: ጳጳስ ታዋድሮስ የኮፕቲክ ኦርቶዶክስ ቤተክርስቲያን አዲሱ 118 ኛ ጳጳስ ሆነው ተመርጠዋል።

English Sentence: The UK's Secretary of State for International Development Justine Greening confirms Britain will cease giving financial aid to India by 2015.
Amharic Sentence: በእንግሊዝ መንግስት ለአለም አቀፍ እድገት ፀሃፊ የሆኑት ጀስቲን ግሪኒን እንግሊዝ ለህንድ የምታደርገውን የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በ2015 እንደምታቆም አስታወቁ።

English Sentence: BP announces it will plead guilty to charges of manslaughter and obstruction of Congress, and will pay a total of US$4.5 billion to the US Department of Justice and Securities and Exchange Commission.
Amharic Sentence: ቢፒ በነፍስ ማጥፋት እና ኮንግረስን በማደናቀፍ ወንጀል ጥፋተኛ መሆኑን አምኖ ለአሜሪካ ፍትህ እና ደህንነት እንዲሁም ለልውውጥ ኮሚሽን በአጠቃላይ 4.5 ቢሊዮን የአሜሪካ ዶላር እንደሚከፍል አስታውቋል።

English Sentence: A bronze statue of Sir Alex Ferguson, a most successful manager in Manchester United’s history, was unveiled outside Old Trafford.
Amharic Sentence: በማንቸስተር ዩናይትድ ታሪክ ውስጥ ስኬታማው አሰልጣኝ የሆነው የሰር አሌክስ ፈርጉሰን በነሃስ የተሰራው ሃውልት ኦልድ ትራፎርድ ደጃፍ ላይ ተመረቀ።

English Sentence: The music video for South Korean pop singer Psy's "Gangnam Style" surpasses 808 million views, making it the most viewed video in the history of YouTube.
Amharic Sentence: የደቡብ ኮርያው ፖፕ ሙዚቃ አቀንቃኝ ፒኤስዋይ በጋንግናም ስታይል የሙዚቃ ቪድዮ በዩትዩብ 808ሚሊዮን እይታ በማግኘት ዩትዩብ ታሪክ በጣም የታየው ቪዲዮ ሆነ።

English Sentence: The UK government is to create a new wave of universities both in the private and public sector, the first new universities in the country for two decades.
Amharic Sentence: የዩኬ መንግስት አዲስ ያለውን እና በሁለት አስርተ አመታት ውስጥ አዲስ የሆኑ የግል እና የመንግስት የዩንቨርሲቲዎችን ሊመሰርት ነው።

English Sentence: M23 rebels announce their withdrawal from territory captured from government troops after a pullout deal was reached in Uganda.
Amharic Sentence: በዩጋንዳ የመውጣት ስምምነት ከተደረገ በኋላ የኤም23 አማፂዎች ከመንግስት ወታደሮች ላይ ይዘዋቸው ከነበሩ ቦታዎች ላይ እንዳፈገፈጉ አሳወቁ።

English Sentence: New data from the NASA space probe MESSENGER indicate that Mercury, the closest planet to the Sun, almost surely has water ice buried beneath the surface at its north pole.
Amharic Sentence: ከናሳ የህዋ ጣቢያ የመጣ አዲስ መልእክት ለፀሃይ የቀረበችው እና ሜርኩረ የተባለቸው ፕላኔት በሰሜን በኩል በሚገኘው ውስጣዊ ክፍሏ የውሃ በረዶ ሊኖራት እንደሚችል አመላከተ።

English Sentence: NASA debunks rumors of new evidence of life on Mars, but its Curiosity rover continues to make many smaller discoveries.
Amharic Sentence: ናሳ በማርስ ላይ ህይወት አለ የሚለውን ሃሳብ ውሸት ነው ሲል ገለፀ፤ ነገር ግን የተላከው መንኩራኩር አዳዲስ እና ትንንሽ ግኝቶችን እያደረገ እንደሆነ አስታውkል።

English Sentence: NASA's twin GRAIL probes have revealed the surface of the Moon in unprecedented detail, showing unexpectedly-deep cracks, craters and tectonic structures.
Amharic Sentence: የናሳ መንታ ግሬል ፕሮግራሞች በጨረቃ የላይኛው ክፍል ላይ ስለሚገኙ ጉርጓዶች፣ ክሬተሮቸ እና በእሳተ ገሞራ የተፈጠሩ ገፅታዎች ተጨማሪ መረጃዎችን አሳዩ።

English Sentence: The President of the Philippines Benigno Aquino declares a state of national calamity in the country following Typhoon Bopha, which has claimed over 450 lives.
Amharic Sentence: የፊሊፒንስ ፕሬዝዳንት ቤኒግኖ አኪኖ ከ 450 በላይ ሰዎችን ሕይወት የቀጠፈውን አውሎ ነፋስ ቦፋ ተከትሎ በሀገሪቱ ውስጥ ብሔራዊ የጥፋት ሁኔታ አዋጅ አወጁ።

English Sentence: Police in Vietnam break up anti-China protests over gas and oil claims in the South China Sea.

English Sentence: Finance Ministers from the European Union agree to giving the European Central Bank new powers to supervise euro zone banks.
Amharic Sentence: የአውሮፓ ህብረት የገንዘብ ሚኒስትሮች የዩሮ ዞን ባንኮችን የመቆጣጠር አዲስ ስልጣን ለ የአውሮፓ ማዕከላዊ ባንክ ለመስጠት ተስማሙ።

English Sentence: An inquest into the death of nurse Jacintha Saldanha hears that she died as a result of self-inflicted hanging.
Amharic Sentence: ስለጤና ረዳቷ ጃቺንታ ሳላዳንሃ ሞት በተደረገ መጠይቅ ጤና ረዳቷ ራሷን በራሷ እንዳጠፋች መረዳት ተችሏል።

English Sentence: Ephraim Mirvis is announced as the next Chief Rabbi of the United Kingdom, replacing Dr. Jonathan Sacks who will step down from the role in 2013.
Amharic Sentence: ኤፍሬም ሚርቪስ እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2013 ከአገልግሎት የሚነሱትን ዶ / ር ዮናታን ሳክስስን በመተካት ቀጣዩ የእንግሊዝ ዋና ረቢ (መምህር) መሆናቸው ታወጀ።

English Sentence: The New York Stock Exchange, the largest stock exchange in the United States and the world, is sold to Atlanta-based IntercontinentalExchange.
Amharic Sentence: ትልቁ የዩናይትድ ስቴትሱ የንግድ ገበያ ማእከል የሆነው የኒው ዮርኩ ንግድ ገበያ መቀመጫውን አትላናታ ላረገውና አህጉር አቀፈዊ የንግድ ገበያ ልውውጥ ለሚሰራው ኢንተርኮንቲነንታል ንግድ ገበያ ተሸጠ።

English Sentence: Vladimir Putin, the President of Russia, grants Russian citizenship to Gérard Depardieu who has renounced his French citizenship due to high taxes.

English Sentence: Police in India charge five men with the murder of a 23-year-old woman who was gang-raped on a bus in Delhi on December 16, 2012.
Amharic Sentence: የህንድ ፖሊስ በታህሳስ 16 2012 በዴልሂ ከተማ በአውቶቢስ ውስጥ በቡድን በተደፈረችው የ23 አመቷ ወጣት የግድያ ወንጀል አምስት ወንዶች ላይ ክስ አቀረበ።

English Sentence: The Church of England drops its prohibition on gay clergy in civil partnerships becoming bishops, so long as they promise to be celibate.
Amharic Sentence: በእንግሊዝ የሚገኙ ቤተ-ክርስትያናት በግብረሶማውያን ቀሳውስት ላይ አስቀምጦ የነበረውን ለጳጳስነት የመታጨት እገዳ ጋብቻ እስካልፈፀሙ ድረስ አነሳ።

English Sentence: Beijing's air pollution reaches levels judged as hazardous to human health.
Amharic Sentence: የቤጂንግ የአየር ብክለት ለሰው ልጅ ጤና አደገኛ ነው ከሚባል ከፍተኛ ደረጃ ላይ ደረሰ።

English Sentence: Boeing 787 aircraft are grounded worldwide over concerns about the safety of their lithium-ion batteries.
Amharic Sentence: ቦይንግ 787 አውሮፕላኖች የሊቲየም-አዮን ባትሪዎቻቸውን ደህንነት በተመለከተ በዓለም ዙሪያ እገዳ ተጥሎባቸዋል።

English Sentence: NASA’s Curiosity rover finds calcium deposits on Mars similar to those seen on Earth when water circulates in cracks and rock fractures.
Amharic Sentence: የናሳ አሳሸ መንኩራኩር በምድር ላይ ውሃ በጠጣር ነገሮች ላይ ሲዘዋወር የምናየው አይነት የምናየው አይነት የካልሺየም ማእድንን በማርስ ላይም እንዳገኘ መረጃ ላከ።

English Sentence: The United States Department of State issues a travel warning to United States citizens for the country of Algeria in response to the In Aménas hostage crisis.
Amharic Sentence: የአሜሪካው የስቴት ዲፓርትምነት በ አልጄሪያ የተፈጠረውን የአሜናስ እገታን ተከትሎ ወደ አልጄሪያ የሚደረጉ ጉዞዎች ላይ የደህንነት ማስጠንቀቂያ አስተላለፈ።

English Sentence: Rescuers from New Zealand and McMurdo Station looking for three Canadians aboard an airplane presumed to have gone down in Antarctica were grappling with bad weather conditions.
Amharic Sentence: ከኒው ዚላንድ እና ከማክሞርዶ ጣቢያ የመጡ የአደጋ ግዜ ሰራተኞች አንታርክቲካ ላይ ወድቋል ተብሎ በሚገመት አውሮፕላን ውስጥ የነበሩ ሦስት ካናዳውያንን ከመጥፎ የአየር ሁኔታ ጋር እየታገሉ ፍለጋቸውን ቀጥለዋል።

English Sentence: A Ukrainian court sentences a former police chief Olexiy Pukach to life imprisonment for murdering journalist Georgiy Gongadze in 2000.
Amharic Sentence: እ.ኤ.አ በ 2000 ዓ.ም የቀድሞው የፖሊስ አዛዥ ኦሌክሲ ፑካክ ጋዜጠኛ ጆርጂ ጊንጋዴዝን በመግደል ወንጀል የዩክሬይን ፍርድ ቤት የዕድሜ ልክ እስራት ፈርዶበታል።

English Sentence: A.C. Milan says it has reached an agreement with Manchester City F.C. to sign Italian striker Mario Balotelli.
Amharic Sentence: ኤሲ ሚላን ከማንቸስተር ሲቲ ኤፍ.ሲ ጋር ጣሊያናዊውን አጥቂ ማሪዮ ባሎቴሊን ለማስፈረም ስምምነት ላይ ደርሰናል ብሏል።

English Sentence: South Korean media reports claim that North Korea has been placed under martial law with another nuclear test considered to be imminent.
Amharic Sentence: ሰሜን ኮሪያ ሌላ የኑክሌር ሙከራ ታሳቢ ያደረገ ወታደራው ሕግ ሥር እንድትሆን መደረግዋን የደቡብ ኮሪያ መገናኛ ብዙኃን ሪፖርቶች ዘግበዋል ።

English Sentence: The Kremlin announces that Russia will hold the 2014 G8 summit in its southern Black Sea resort of Sochi, the host of the 2014 Winter Olympics.
Amharic Sentence: ከክሬመሊን የወጣው መግለጫ እንደሚያሳውቀው ሩሲያ የ2014ን የጂ8 ስብሰባ የ2014 የክረምት ኦሎምፒክ በምታዘጋው የደቡባዊ የጥቁር ባህር ማረፊያ ሶቺ ለማድረግ ወስናለች።

English Sentence: Afzal Guru is hanged at Tihar Jail in New Delhi, India, for his role in the 2001 Indian Parliament attack.
Amharic Sentence: አፍዛል ጉሩ ከ2001 የህንድ ፓርላማ ጥቃት ጋር በተያያዘ በኒው ዴልሂ በሚገኘው ቲሃር እስር ቤት ውስጥ በስቅላት ተገደለ።

English Sentence: Tens of millions of Hindus bathe in the Ganges River in the Indian city of Allahabad during the Maha Kumbh Mela festival.
Amharic Sentence: በአስር ሚሊዮኖች የሚቆጠሩ ሂንዱዎች በህንድ በምተገኘው አላህአባድ ከተማ በማሃ ኩምብ ፌስቲቫል አከባበር ላይ በጋንጀስ ወንዝ ውስጥ ታጠቡ።

English Sentence: In motorsport, Danica Patrick becomes the first woman to win pole position at the Daytona 500 and the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series.
Amharic Sentence: በሞተር ውድድር፤ ዳኒካ ፓተሪክ በናስካር ስፕሪነት ካፕ ሲሪየሥ በዳይቶና 500 ውድድር ላይ በማሸነፏ የመጀመሪያዋ እስንስት ሆነች።

English Sentence: North Korea threatens the "final destruction" of South Korea during a United Nations conference on disarmament.
Amharic Sentence: በተባበሩት መንግስታት በትጥቅ ማስፈታት ጉዳይ ላይ በተደረገው ኮንፍረንስ ሰሜን ኮሪያ ደቡብ ኮሪያን ለመጨረሻ ጊዜ አጠፋሻለው ስትል ዛተች።

English Sentence: The Canadian Security Intelligence Service warns of possible attacks within Canada due to the presence of Al-Qaeda affiliated groups in the country.
Amharic Sentence: የካናዳ የደህንነት ኢንተለጀንስ አገልግሎት የአልቃይዳ ተጓዳኝ ቡድኖች በሀገሪቱ ውስጥ በመኖራቸው በካናዳ ላይ ጥቃት ሊደርስ ይችላል ሲል ያስጠነቅቃል።

English Sentence: A new study finds that chimpanzees will solve puzzles for the fun of it.
Amharic Sentence: አንድ አዲስ ጥናት ችምፓንዚዎች የፐዝል ጨዋታዎችን እየተጫወቱ እንደሚገጣጥሙ አሳወቀ።

English Sentence: A study concludes that continuous standing and walking reduces the risk of type II diabetes better than either sitting/lying or exercise.
Amharic Sentence: አንድ ጥናት ው ከመቀመጥ እና ጋደም ከማለት ወይም እንቅስቃሴ ከማድረግ በላይ ለተከታታይ ጊዜያት መቆም እና መራመድ ከሁለተኛው የስኳር በሽታ አይነት ከመያዝ ሊታደግ ይችላል ሲል አመላከተ።

English Sentence: Following treatment, a 2-year-old Mississippi girl born with the HIV/AIDS virus is pronounced to be HIV negative.
Amharic Sentence: ህክምናን ተከትሎ ከኤች አይ ቪ/ኤድስ ቫይረስ ጋር የተወለደችው የ 2 ዓመቷ የሚሲሲፒ ህፃን ኤች አይ ቪ ነጌቲቭ መሆኗ ተገለጸ።

English Sentence: Eddie Maher, who spent almost 20 years as a fugitive in the United States, is jailed for five years for stealing a security van containing £1.2m in Suffolk, England.
Amharic Sentence: በአሜሪካ ለ20 አመታት በስደት የቆየው ኤዲ ማሀር በእንግሊዝ ሰፎልክ የደህንነት ሰራተኞችን መኪና በመስረቁ ለአምስት አመት የሞቆይ የእስር ፍርድ ተፈረደበት።

English Sentence: Manchester United player Rio Ferdinand may face a disciplinary procedure after his sarcastic hand-clapping gesture before Cüneyt Çakır at the end of the game.
Amharic Sentence: የማንችስተር ዩናይትዱ ተጫዋች ሪዮ ፈርዲናንድ በጨዋታው መጨረሻ ጁንየት ችኩር ፊት በማጨብጨብ በማንጓጠጡ የዲሲፕሊን እርምጃ ለወሰድበት ይችላል።

English Sentence: The United Nations Security Council approves unanimously new sanctions against North Korea for its recent nuclear test.
Amharic Sentence: የተባበሩት መንግስታት የፀጥታው ምክር ቤት ለሰሞኑን የሰሜን ኮሪያ የኑክሌር ሙከራዋ ላይ አዲስ ማዕቀቦችን በሙሉ ድምጽ አጽድቋል።

English Sentence: Six people, including multiple elected officials, are arrested on charges of fraud for allegedly attempting to rig the 2013 New York City mayoral election.
Amharic Sentence: የ2013 የኒውዮርክ ከተማ ከንቲባ ምረጫ ለማጭበርበር ተንቀሳቅሳችዋል በሚል ስድስት ሰዎችን ተያዙ፤ ከተያዙት ሰዎች መካከል የተመረጡ ባለስልጣናትም ይገኙበታል።

English Sentence: Writer Ruth Prawer Jhabvala, the only person to have won both an Academy Award and a Booker Prize, dies at the age of 85.
Amharic Sentence: የአካዳሚ ሽልማትንመ የቡክ ፕራይዝንም ሽልማቶች በመውሰድ ብቸኛ የነበረቸው ሩት ፕራወር ጃህበቫላ በ85 አመቷ ከዚህ አለም በሞት ተለይታለች።

English Sentence: A new study suggests that common cholesterol reducing drugs may also prevent macular degeneration.
Amharic Sentence: አዲስ ጥናት እንደሚያመለክተው ኮሌስትሮልን የሚቀንሱ መድኃኒቶች የእይታ መቀነስ ችግርንም ሊከላከሉ ይችላሉ።

English Sentence: Pope Francis appoints a panel of nine high-ranking prelates from around the world to advise him of the running of the Catholic Church and advise him on the reform of the Vatican bureaucracy.
Amharic Sentence: ፖፕ ፍራንሲስ ከተለያየ አለም አካባቢ የመጡ ዘጠኝ ከፍተኛ ደረጃ ያላቸው ጳጳሳትን ለአማካሪነት እና የቫቲካንን ቢሮክራሲ ለውጥ ለማምጥት በሚል ሹመት ሰጡ።

English Sentence: U.S. President Barack Obama visits the city of Boston in the wake of the recent marathon bombings.
Amharic Sentence: ከማራቶን ቦምብ አደጋ በ|ላ የአሜሪካው ፕሬዚደንት ባራክ ኦባማ በቦስተን ከተማ ጉብኝት አደረጉ።

English Sentence: A study finds that men who wear kilts and no underwear have higher sperm counts than men who sport underwear.
Amharic Sentence: አንድ ጥናት እንደሚያመላክተው የውስጥ ልብስ ከሚያደርጉ ወንዶች ይበልጥ ባህላዊ ቀሚስ የሚያደረጉ እና የውስጥ ልብስ የማያደርጉ ወንዶች ከፍተኛ የዘር(ነባዘር) መጠን አላቸው።

English Sentence: In tennis, Russia and Italy advance to the final of the 2013 Fed Cup World Group defeating Slovakia and Czech Republic respectively.
Amharic Sentence: በቴኒስ ሩሲያ እና ጣሊያን በቅደም ተከተል ስሎቫኪያ እና ቼክ ሪፐብሊክን በማሸነፍ ወደ 2013 የ ፌድ ካፕ ወርልድ ግሩፕ ፍፃሜ አልፈዋል።

English Sentence: After being missing for over a week, the body of Sunil Tripathi is found in the Providence River.
Amharic Sentence: የሱኒል ትሪፓቲ ሬሳ ለሳምንታት ከጠፋ በ|ላ በፕሮቪደንስ ወንዝ ውስጥ ተገኘ።

English Sentence: Seven-time Prime Minister of Italy Giulio Andreotti dies in Rome at the age of 94 years.
Amharic Sentence: ለሰባት ጊዜ የጣሊያን ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር ሆነው ያገለገሉት ጂውሊዎ አንደሮቲ በ94 አመታቸው በሮም ከተማ ከዚህ አለም በሞት ተለዩ።

English Sentence: Indian National Congress won legislative assembly election of Indian state Karnataka with clear majority.
Amharic Sentence: የህንድ ብሄራዊ ኮንግረስ በካርናታካ ክልል የተደረገውን የህግ አውጪ ምክር ቤት ምርጫ በከፍተኛ ብልጫ አሸነፈ።

English Sentence: Gunmen break into the home of an anti-terrorism police officer in the Baghdad suburbs, killing him and his family.

English Sentence: Ukrainian security forces start dismantling protest camps in Kiev with two protesters feared dead after clashes with police. ,

English Sentence: Judith Collins resigns from the New Zealand Cabinet following allegations that she undermined the head of the Serious Fraud Office in 2011 when she had ministerial responsibility.

English Sentence: Mohammad Reza Rahimi, former Iranian vice president, is convicted to a prison term for his role in the 2011 embezzlement scandal.

English Sentence: China says two pilots conducting fighter jet take-off and landing tests for the Chinese aircraft carrier Liaoning were killed during trials.
Amharic Sentence: ቻይና እንዳስታወቀችው ለቻይናው የአውሮፕላን ተሸካሚ ሊያዎኒንግ የጦር አውሮፕላንን የማስነሳት እና የማሳረፍ ሙከራዎችን እያደረጉ የነበሩ ሁለት አብራሪዎች በሙከራ ጊዜ ተገድለዋል አለች።

English Sentence: American twins Bob and Mike Bryan win their fifth US Open men's doubles title, giving them 100 ATP World Tour titles as a team.

English Sentence: Clarence House confirms that the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge are expecting their second child.

English Sentence: Gold extends a fresh three-month low as a stronger U.S. dollar sapped investor appetite for the metal.
Amharic Sentence: የአሜሪካ ዶላር ዋጋ መናርን ተከትሎ ኢንቨስተሮች ለወርቅ ያላቸውን ፍላጎት ቀንሷል፤ በዚህም ባለፉት ሶስት ወራት የወርቅ ዋጋ አሽቆልቁሏል።

English Sentence: India suspends rescue operations due to heavy rain in Jammu and Kashmir state where over 100,000 still await rescue.
Amharic Sentence: ህንድ ከ 100,000 በላይ ሰዎች አሁንም የማዳን እርዳታን በሚጠብቁበት የጃሙ እና ካሽሚር ግዛት ውስጥ ከባድ ዝናብ በመኖሩ ምክንያት የማዳን ሥራዎችን አስቆመች።

English Sentence: Lawmakers from Ukraine ratify a landmark agreement with the European Union in tandem with a meeting of the European Parliament.
Amharic Sentence: ከአውሮፓ ፓርላማ ስብሰባ በሚገኝ ትብብር ከዩክሬን የመጡ የሕግ አውጭዎች ከአውሮፓ ህብረት ጋር ታሪካዊ ስምምነትን ያፀድቃሉ።

English Sentence: Students from more than 20 universities and colleges in Hong Kong are boycotting class in protest against Beijing’s decision to rule out fully democratic elections.

English Sentence: The World Health Organisation says that the death toll from the Ebola virus is over 2,900.

English Sentence: Fatah and Hamas agree to form a unity government on the Gaza Strip.
Amharic Sentence: ፋታህ እና ሃማስ በጋዛ ሰርጥ ላይ የተዋሃደ መንግሰት ለመፍጠር ተስማሙ።

English Sentence: Pacific walruses unable to find sea ice on which to rest in Arctic waters are coming ashore in record numbers on a beach in north-west Alaska.
Amharic Sentence: በአርክቲክ ውሃዎች ላይ ለማረፍያ የሚሆን የባህር በረዶ ግግር ማግኘት ያልቻሉ የፓስፊክ ዋልረሶች በሰሜናዊ ምዕራብ አላስካ ባህር ዳርቻ ላይ ሪከርድ በሆነ ቁጥር በመምጣት ላይ ናቸው ።

English Sentence: 18,000 Palestinians are facing life-threatening shortages of water in the Yarmouk Camp neighborhood of Damascus.

English Sentence: British neuroscientist John O'Keefe and Norwegian scientists May-Britt Moser and Edvard Moser share the 2014 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.

English Sentence: Albania's prime minister is embroiled in scandal after his brother is linked to the stunt.

English Sentence: In North American Major League Baseball, the Kansas City Royals sweep the Baltimore Orioles in the 2014 American League Championship Series 4-0 to progress to the 2014 World Series.

English Sentence: Protesters in Iran call for increased security after four women are injured in acid attacks in Isfahan for allegedly not wearing veils.

English Sentence: The Temple Mount in Jerusalem was closed to all visitors for the first time since 2000, following the attempted assassination of Israeli activist Yehuda Glick.

English Sentence: Mexican Federal Police arrest a mayor and his wife, the alleged masterminds of the kidnapping of 43 students in Iguala, Guerrero.

English Sentence: Mali confirms that it has a new case of Ebola virus, this time in the capital Bamako.

English Sentence: The Church of England adopts legislation paving the way for the appointment of female bishops.

English Sentence: UNESCO declares the Rizal Monument in Manila, Machu Picchu of Peru, Camino de Santiago of Spain, and the Dampier Archipelago of Australia as World Heritage Sites in Danger.

English Sentence: The Scottish Parliament elects Nicola Sturgeon as the first female First Minister of Scotland.

English Sentence: A roadside bomb planted at a bus station near the town of Mubi in northeastern Nigeria kills 40, including 5 soldiers.

English Sentence: Greek labor unions begin a general strike to protest ongoing government austerity measures shuting down public medical, educational, and transportational services.

English Sentence: France sets a new record for unemployment with 3.46 million recorded in October.

English Sentence: The UN Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East declares a state of emergency on the Gaza Strip following heavy floods.

English Sentence: The United Nations World Food Program suspends a food program for 1.7 million Syrian refugees after donor countries fail to meet their commitments.

English Sentence: A South African judge rules that the prosecution can appeal the decision not to convict Oscar Pistorius for the murder of Reeva Steenkamp in 2013 to the Supreme Court of Appeal.
Amharic Sentence: የደቡብ አፍሪካው የፍርድ ቤት ዳኛ ኦስካር ፒስተርየስ በሪቫ ስቲንካምፕ ግድያ ላይ ባስተላለፈው ፍርድ ላይ አቃቤ ህግ በጠቅላይ የይግባኝ ፍርድ ቤት ይግባኝ ማለት እንደሚችል አስታወቀ።

English Sentence: In the NBA, Kobe Bryant of the Los Angeles Lakers moves to third on the all-time point scorer list overtaking Michael Jordan.

English Sentence: The People's Republic of China releases 10 South African tourists held for allegedly distributing terrorist material.

English Sentence: The Children's Hospital of Philadelphia announces that 8-year old Zion Harvey became the first pediatric patient to receive a double hand transplant earlier this month.

English Sentence: The World Health Organization announces that, since the Ebola outbreak began in March 2014, last week marked the first week of no new cases worldwide.

English Sentence: The American Cancer Society recommends women at average risk of breast cancer should begin annual mammograms at age 45, and women 55 and older scale back screening to every other year.

English Sentence: Lewis Hamilton wins a third World Drivers' Championship in Formula One, as his team Mercedes secures the Constructors' Championship.

English Sentence: The American Federal Bureau of Investigation is investigating claims that the Hillary Clinton campaign has been hacked as part of recent cyber-attacks on the Democrats. ,

Amharic Sentence: ቅዳሜ መገባደጃ በሄርሞን ተራራ ላይ ለተተኮሱ ሁለት ሮኬቶች ምላሽ በመስጠት በጎላን ሃይትስ በሶሪያ ወታደራዊ ኢላማዎች ላይ በተደረገ የአየር ጥቃት እስራኤል አስር ሰዎችን ገድላለች።

English Sentence: Riviera Beach, Florida, is paying $600,000 to a hacker who took over local government computers three weeks ago.
Amharic Sentence: ሪቪዬራ ቢች ፣ ፍሎሪዳ ፣ ከሦስት ሳምንት በፊት የአካባቢውን መንግስት ኮምፒውተሮች ለተቆጣጠረ አንድ ጠላፊ 600,000 የአሜሪካ ዶላር ይከፍላል።

English Sentence: Japan's Defense Ministry says Russian Air Force bombers violated southern Japanese airspace, prompting Japan Air Self-Defense Force fighters to scramble and escort the planes out of the area.

English Sentence: Iranian Americans protest outside the State Department as tensions increase.

English Sentence: A ceremony is held at the former site of Germany’s Buchenwald concentration camp to remember people imprisoned there because they were thought to be gay.

English Sentence: A major holiday celebration and military parade is held in Washington, D.C., United States, by President Donald Trump to commemorate the Fourth of July/Independence Day.

English Sentence: The Shanghai police department says that Wang is a conman who was convicted for fraud in 2016 and is being investigated for another case of fraud since April 2019.
Amharic Sentence: እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2016 ዓ.ም ዋንግ በማጭበርበር ተፈርዶበት የነበረ ሲሆን፣ እ.ኤ.አ ከሚያዝያ ወር 2019 ዓ.ም ጀምሮ በሌላ የማጭበርበር ጉዳይ ምርመራ እየተደረገበት መሆኑን የሻንጋይ ፖሊስ መምሪያ አስታውቋል።

English Sentence: A Camair-Co plane is fired upon while attempting to land at Bamenda Airport, but the pilot manages to safely land the plane with no casualties reported.

English Sentence: Twitter bans almost 6,000 accounts, alleging that they were "amplifying messages favourable to Saudi authorities" in a Saudi state-backed coordination.

English Sentence: Swedish auto manufacturer Volvo Cars resumes full production at its plant in Torslanda, Sweden, which had been shut down due to the COVID-19 pandemic since March 26, 2020.

English Sentence: The Indian Council of Medical Research advises all states to suspend using COVID-19 rapid test kits for two days, after some kits were found to be faulty.

English Sentence: Microsoft announces a $1.5 billion investment in Italy, as part of its expansion of cloud computing services around the world.

English Sentence: The UK's national debt exceeds £2 trillion ($2.61tn) for the first time, according to data from the Office for National Statistics.

English Sentence: Polish biotechnology company Mabion S.A. signs an agreement with Novavax to begin commercial-scale production trials for Novavax's future vaccine.

English Sentence: YouTube suspends channels run by Myanmar's military and removes junta propaganda videos for "violating its community guidelines and terms of service".

English Sentence: The United States Navy announces that it has seized a shipment of thousands of weapons in a stateless dhow on the Arabian Sea believed to be en-route to Yemen.

English Sentence: Eid al-Fitr, the "Feast of Breaking the Fast" that marks the end of the month-long dawn-to-sunset fasting of Ramadan, is celebrated in Istanbul's Hagia Sophia for the first time in 87 years.

English Sentence: The United Nations' World Meteorological Organization confirms that a record high temperature of 18.3 °C (64.9 °F) has been recorded in Antarctica at the Esperanza Base.

English Sentence: India's economy rebounded at a record rate of 20.1% in the three months to the end of June even as a devastating second wave of COVID-19 hits the country.

English Sentence: The European Parliament adopted a resolution that demands an “immediate cessation of hostilities by all parties” and calls for an Ethiopian-led inclusive national dialogue including representatives from Tigray, Amhara, Benishangul-Gumuz, Afar, Oromia, Sidama, Somali, Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples’ Region (SNNPR), and Gambella to find a lasting solution to the ongoing crisis in the country, The Reporter learnt.

English Sentence: The Parliament also called on its Member States “to halt exports of arms and surveillance technology to Ethiopia that are being used to facilitate attacks on civilians and perpetrate human rights violations,” the resolution reads.

English Sentence: The postponement was a controversial move for Ethiopian political parties, especially the Tigray People’s Liberation Front (TPLF) which held regional elections unilaterally in defiance of the federal government’s decision to postpone the election.

English Sentence: In a meeting held late on Friday, the Ministry of Trade and Industry (MoTI) consulted business owners and managers from the Tigray region on ways of addressing the problems companies faced during the operation.

English Sentence: Officials of the Ministry noted that 93 giant enterprises and nearly 6700 small and medium enterprises are found in the region, and that a task force has been established to conduct a survey and investigate the cost of damages to reinvigorate factories into normal production.

English Sentence: Ethiopia and France signed a military cooperation accord in March 2019 during President Emmanuel Macron’s visit to Addis Ababa.
Amharic Sentence: እ.ኤ.አ. በመጋቢት ወር 2011 ዓ.ም ፕሬዝዳንት ኢማኑኤል ማክሮን አዲስ አበባን በጎበኙበት ወቅት ኢትዮጵያ እና ፈረንሳይ የወታደራዊ ትብብር ስምምነት ተፈራርመዋል።

English Sentence: The deal includes helping the landlocked nation build a navy.
Amharic Sentence: ስምምነቱ ወደብ አልባው ሀገር የባህር ሃይል እንዲገነባ መርዳትን ይጨምራል።

English Sentence: The accord also provides for air cooperation, joint operations and opportunities for training and equipment purchases.
Amharic Sentence: ስምምነቱ የአየር ኃይል ትብብርን፣ የጋራ ስራዎችን እንዲሁም የስልጠና እና የመሳሪያ ግዥ እድሎችን ይሰጣል።

English Sentence: Three international oil trading firms bidding to supply fuel to the Ethiopian Petroleum Supply Enterprise (EPSE) in the 2019 fiscal year.

English Sentence: Last September EPSE has floated a tender inviting international oil trading companies for the supply of fuel to be delivered as of January 2019.
Amharic Sentence: እ.ኤ.አ. ከጥር ወር 2019 ዓ.ም ጀምሮ ለሚቀርበው የነዳጅ አቅርቦት ዓለም አቀፍ የነዳጅ ንግድ ኩባንያዎችን የሚጋብዝ ጨረታ ባለፈው መስከረም ወር ኢፒኤስኢ አቅርቧል።

English Sentence: It is recalled that Ethio Telecom has recently announced the launching of 4G LTE service in 92 towns nationwide and in the capital, Addis Ababa as phase-I 4G LTE service expansion strategic plan for the 2020/21 budget year.
Amharic Sentence: ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም የ 2020/21 በጀት አመት የመጀመሪያውን ዙር የ4ጂ ኤል.ቲ.ኢ አገልግሎት ማስፋፊያ ስልታዊ ዕቅዶችን በቅርቡ በሀገር አቀፍ ደረጃ በ 92 ከተሞች እና በመዲናዋ አዲስ አበባ የ4ጂ ኤል.ቲ.ኢ አገልግሎት መጀመሩን ማስታወቁ ይታወሳል።

English Sentence: Ethio Telecom also promised to expand the service in the remaining towns of the country as we have been immensely working on to finalize phase -Il network upgrading and expansion to meet the ever-growing data demands of customers.

English Sentence: Ethiopia has earned $1.33 billion from exports during the past five months, attaining 94% of the $1.41 billion target.
Amharic Sentence: ኢትዮጵያ ባለፉት አምስት ወራት 1.33 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ከኤክስፖርት ገቢ ስታገኝ ከታቀደው 1.41 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ውስጥ 94 በመቶውን ማሳካት ችላለች።

English Sentence: The revenue increased by $224.5 million or 20% compared to the same period last year, according to the Ministry of Trade and Industry.

English Sentence: Ethiopian Sugar Corporation which was selected Chair of the International Council for 2018 at the last conference held in London 2017 made the announcement today.

English Sentence: Ethiopia and South Korea have signed an agreement that could enable to jointly work on issues tied with urban land development.

English Sentence: The agreement was signed between Solomon Kebede, Head of the Federal Urban Land and Land Related Issues Registration Agency, and his Korean counterpart Biki Chaw.

English Sentence: Everest Textile Co, which makes fabrics and garments, said two new plants in Ethiopia and the US are scheduled to start operations in the first half of this year.

English Sentence: The plant in Ethiopia is to manufacture garments for the company’s brand name customers from Europe, while the US facility is to supply knitted fabrics and garments to customers in the US, the firm said.

English Sentence: The Ethiopian Human Rights Council (EHRCo) called for legal and operational amendments for future elections based on its observation outcomes of the elections conducted on September 30, 2021.

English Sentence: According to a preliminary report issued by the Council on Thursday October 21, 2021 at Saphire Addis Hotel, irregularities were observed both in the elections and the Southwestern Peoples’ Region referendum.

English Sentence: Speaking to The Reporter, the Amhara regional state police commissioner, Abere Adamu reaffirmed the readiness of the regional police force to go into operation in Benishagul region if the federal government is busy handling other matters.

English Sentence: The WHO Representative to Ethiopia, Dr. Boureima Hama Sambo, thanked Canada for the available funding to support the continuity of essential health services. He said, “The grant will not only strengthen the provision of quality, gender-responsive essential health services at primary care level but also boost health system resilience by building the capacity of regional and city health authorities to deal with current and future crises.”
Amharic Sentence: የጤና ድርጅት ኢትዮጵያ ተወካይ ዶ/ር ቡሬማ ሃማ ሳምቦ አስፈላጊ የጤና አገልግሎት ቀጣይነትን ለመደገፍ ከካናዳ ላለው የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ምስጋና አቅርቧል። "እርዳታው ጥራት ያለው፣ ጾታዊ ምላሽ የሚሰጡ አስፈላጊ የጤና አገልግሎት መስጠትን ከማጠናከሩም ባሻገር የአካባቢና የከተማ ጤና ባለስልጣናት አሁን ያሉና ወደፊት የሚከሰቱ ቀውሶችን የመፍታት አቅም በመገንባት የጤና ስርዓት የመቋቋም አቅምን ያሳድጋል" ብለዋል።

English Sentence: This grant will benefit approximately 6.5 million Ethiopians in need, of which 50 percent are expected to be women.
Amharic Sentence: ይህ እርዳታ ወደ 6.5 ሚሊዮን የሚጠጉ የተቸገሩ ኢትዮጵያውያንን ተጠቃሚ የሚያደርግ ሲሆን ከእነዚህ ውስጥ 50 በመቶ የሚሆኑት ሴቶች ይሆናሉ ተብሎ ይጠበቃል።

English Sentence: Eka Kotebe General Hospital, which incorporates a mental institution in its premises, has been officially inaugurated today by Deputy Prime Minister Demeke Mekonnen and Health Minister Amir Aman.
Amharic Sentence: በግቢው ውስጥ የአእምሮ ተቋምን ያካተተው ኤካ ኮተቤ አጠቃላይ ሆስፒታል ዛሬ በምክትል ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ደመቀ መኮንን እና በጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር አሚር አማን በይፋ ተመርቋል።

English Sentence: Since it began operation in 2017, the hospital has provided health services for 116, 029 patients, of which 25 percent are mental disabled persons, it was learned.
Amharic Sentence: ሆስፒታሉ ስራውን ከ2017 ከጀመረ ጀምሮ ለ116,029 ህሙማን የጤና አገልግሎት ሲሰጥ ከነዚህም ውስጥ 25 በመቶ የሚሆኑት የአዕምሮ ህሙማን መሆናቸውን ለማወቅ ተችሏል።

English Sentence: A cornerstone has been laid today, to build the Ethiopia’s first specialized cardiac care center in the capital at a cost of 40 million Euro.
Amharic Sentence: በመዲናዋ የኢትዮጵያን የመጀመሪያ ልዩ የልብ ህክምና ማዕከል በ40 ሚሊዮን ዩሮ ወጪ ለመገንባት ዛሬ የመሰረት ድንጋይ ተጥሏል።

English Sentence: Minister of Health, Dr. Amir Aman and The Netherland’s Ambassador to Ethiopia, Bengt Van Loosdrecht have laid the cornerstone to build the cardiac care center at Black Lion hospital.
Amharic Sentence: የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስትር ዶ/ር አሚር አማን እና በኢትዮጵያ የኔዘርላንድ አምባሳደር ቤን ግቫን ሉስሬት በጥቁር አንበሳ ሆስፒታል የልብ ህክምና ማዕከልን ለመገንባት የመሰረት ድንጋይ አስቀምጠዋል።

English Sentence: Gudaf Tsegay broke the women’s world record for the indoor 1500 metres on Tuesday after posting a time of three minutes, 53.09 seconds during a meeting in Lievin, France.
Amharic Sentence: ጉዳፍ ጸጋይ ማክሰኞ እለት በፈረንሳይ ሊቪን በተካሄደው ውድድር ላይ ሶስት ደቂቃ ከ53.09 ሰከንድ በመግባት የሴቶችን የቤት ውስጥ የ1500 ሜትር ክብረወሰን ሰበረች።

English Sentence: Ethiopian Tsegay beat by more than two seconds the previous record set by her compatriot Genzebe Dibaba in Karlsruhe in 2014.
Amharic Sentence: ኢትዮጵያዊቷ ፀጋይ በ2014 የአገሯ ልጅ ገንዘቤ ዲባባበካርልስሩ ያስመዘገበችውን ሪከርድ ከሁለት ሰከንድ በላይ በማሻሻል አሸንፋለች።

English Sentence: “I’m very happy to set a world indoor record. I have been training really hard and I set myself a target to break the world indoor record,” Gudaf Tsegay told the World Athletics website.
Amharic Sentence: “የአለም የቤት ውስጥ ሪከርድ በማስመዝገቤ በጣም ደስተኛ ነኝ። በጣም ጠንክሬ ተለማምጃለሁ እናም የአለምን የቤት ውስጥ ክብረ ወሰን ለመስበር አልሜ ነበር።” ስትል ጉዳፍ ጸጋይ ለአለም አትሌቲክስ ድረ-ገጽ ተናግራለች።

English Sentence: Athlete Lena Hailu also won the French Indoor Championships in the 3000 meter while Athlete Habtam Alemu finished second in the French 800 meter.
Amharic Sentence: አትሌት ሌና ሀይሉ በ3000 ሜትር የፈረንሳይ የቤት ውስጥ ሻምፒዮና አሸናፊ ስትሆን አትሌት ሀብታም አለሙ በፈረንሳይ 800 ሜትር ሁለተኛ ሆና አጠናቃለች።

English Sentence: The first Great Ethiopian Run in North America is scheduled to take place in Minnesota, USA, on the 4th of July 2020.
Amharic Sentence: የመጀመሪያው የሰሜን አሜሪካ ታላቁ ሩጫ በኢትዮጵያ በሚኒሶታ ዩኤስኤ ሃምሌ 4 ቀን 2020 ሊደረግ ነው።

English Sentence: The Great Ethiopian Run scheduled to take place for the first time outside Africa is also the 1st edition in the US.
Amharic Sentence: ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ከአፍሪካ ውጪ ሊደረግ የታቀደው የታላቁ ሩጫ በኢትዮጵያ በአሜሪካም ሲካሄድ የመጀመሪያው ነው።

English Sentence: In an exclusive interview with ENA, Great Ethiopian Run General Manager Ermias Ayele said preparations are being finalized to celebrate the event together with the Ethiopian Diaspora residing in USA and around the world.
Amharic Sentence: የታላቁ ሩጫ በኢትዮጵያ ዋና ስራ አስኪያጅ ኤርሚያስ አየለ ለኢዜአ በሰጡት ልዩ ቃለ ምልልስ በአሜሪካ እና በአለም ዙሪያ ከሚኖሩ ኢትዮጵያውያን ዳያስፖራዎች ጋር በመሆን በዓሉን ለማክበር ዝግጅት እየተጠናቀቀ ነው።

English Sentence: The International Federation of Association Football (FIFA) will hold its 70th congress in Addis Ababa next year.
Amharic Sentence: የአለም አቀፉ የእግር ኳስ ማህበር (ፊፋ) 70ኛ ጉባኤውን በሚቀጥለው አመት በአዲስ አበባ ያካሂዳል።

English Sentence: The FIFA Congress, the most-critical gathering of international football’s governing body, used to assemble every two years.
Amharic Sentence: የዓለም አቀፍ የእግር ኳስ አስተዳዳሪ አካል እጅግ ወሳኝ የሆነው የፊፋ ኮንግረስ በየሁለት ዓመቱ ይሰበሰብ ነበር።

English Sentence: According to chief of staff of the African Union chairperson, Ambassador Abdoulaye Diop the next congress will take place at the AU’s headquarters in Addis Ababa in May 2020.
Amharic Sentence: የአፍሪካ ህብረት ሊቀመንበር አምባሳደር አብዱላዬ ዲዮፕ እንደገለፁት ቀጣዩ ኮንግረስ በግንቦት 2020 በአዲስ አበባ በሚገኘው የአፍሪካ ህብረት ዋና ፅህፈት ቤት ይካሄዳል።

English Sentence: This year’s 18th Great Ethiopian Run has grown to become a major street festival in Africa attracting thousands locals and foreign tourists every year.
Amharic Sentence: የዘንድሮው 18ኛው ታላቁ ሩጫ በኢትዮጵያ በአፍሪካ ውስጥ ታላቅ የጎዳና ላይ ፌስቲቫል በመሆን በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ የሀገር ውስጥ እና የውጭ ሀገር ቱሪስቶችን የሚስብ ነው።

English Sentence: On today, thousands people have taken to the streets of Addis Ababa to take part in Africa’s biggest road race, a challenging 10km run at 10,000ft above sea level.
Amharic Sentence: ዛሬ በአዲስ አበባ ጎዳናዎች በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ሰዎች ከባህር ጠለል በላይ በ10,000 ጫማ ርቀት በ10 ኪሎ ሜትር ፈታኝ በሆነው የአፍሪካ ትልቁ የጎዳና ላይ ውድድር ላይ ለመሳተፍ ወጥተዋል።

English Sentence: On the day, a huge variety of runners from all age groups and fitness levels participated, it was indicated.
Amharic Sentence: በእለቱ በተለያየ የእድሜ ክልል እና የአካል ብቃት ደረጃ የሚገኙ እጅግ በጣም ብዙ አይነት ሯጮች መሳተፋቸው ተጠቁሟል።

English Sentence: The Ethiopian National Football Team has qualified for the Africa Cup of Nations (CAF) today.
Amharic Sentence: የኢትዮጵያ ብሔራዊ ቡድን ዛሬ ለአፍሪካ ዋንጫ (ካፍ) ማለፉን አረጋግጧል።

English Sentence: Ethiopia qualified for CAF after the match between Niger and Madagascar ended in a draw, while Cote d’Ivoire beat Ethiopia 3 to 1.
Amharic Sentence: ኢትዮጵያ በኒጀር እና ማዳጋስካር መካከል የተደረገው ጨዋታ በአቻ ውጤት በመጠናቀቁ ወደ ካፍ ስታልፍ፤ ኮትዲቯር ኢትዮጵያን 3 ለ 1 አሸንፋለች።

English Sentence: Letesenbet smashed the world record at the Valencia Half Marathon Trinidad Alfonso EDP, clocking 1:02:52 on her debut at the distance at the World Athletics Elite Label road race on Sunday.
Amharic Sentence: ለተሰንበት በቫሌንሲያ የግማሽ ማራቶን ትሪኒዳድ አልፎንሶ ኢዴፒ 1፡02፡52 በሆነ ሰአት በዚህ ርቀት የመጀመርያዋ በሆነው እሁድ እለት በተካሄደው የአለም አትሌቲክስ ኢሊት ሌብል የጎዳና ላይ ውድድር የአለም ክብረወሰንን ሰብራለች።

English Sentence: Competing in the same Spanish city where she broke the world 5000m record last year, Gidey took more than a minute off the previous mark of 1:04:02 set by world marathon champion Ruth Chepngetich earlier this year.
Amharic Sentence: ባለፈው አመት የአለምን የ5000ሜ. ሪከርድ በሰበረችበት በዚሁ የስፔን ከተማ የተወዳደረችው ግደይ የበፊቱን በአለም የማራቶን ሻምፒዮና ሩት ቼፕንገቲች በዚህ አመት መጀመርያ የተመዘገበውን 1፡04፡02 ነጥብ ከአንድ ደቂቃ በላይ አሻሽላለች።

English Sentence: Ethiopian-Israel golfer Asher Iso, without taking anything away from the extraordinary achievements of the other winners this week, has championed Israel Men’s Masters Tournament at the Caesarea Golf Club.
Amharic Sentence: ኢትዮጵያ እስራኤላዊው ጎልፍ ተጫዋች አሸር ኢሶ በዚህ ሳምንት ከሌሎቹ አሸናፊዎች አስደናቂ ድሎች ምንም ሳይወስድ የእስራኤል ወንዶች ማስተርስ ቶርናመንትን በሴዛርያ ጎልፍ ክለብ አሸንፏል።

English Sentence: Asher, a dedicated staff member of the club, immigrated to Israel from Ethiopia in 1991 and first came to the golf club 27 years ago.
Amharic Sentence: የክለቡ ታማኝ ሰራተኛ የነበረው አሸር በ1991 ከኢትዮጵያ ወደ እስራኤል የተሰደደ ሲሆን ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ወደ ጎልፍ ክለብ የመጣው ከ27 አመት በፊት ነው።

English Sentence: In Betking Ethiopia Premier League match, happened in Hawasa, the champions Fasil Kenema beat Hadiya Hosaena 3 to 1.

English Sentence: “Passing decision on who makes the cut is the responsibility of the Athletics Federation. Our main demand is to achieve results that will raise the flag of our country. So, we can’t stand by and watch when athletes who have one of the best times are left out of the competition due to improper practices,” Ashebir said.

English Sentence: The 22-year-old has now won her second league title in Europe, with her first the Swedish Elitettan crown in the colours of Kungsbacka DFF in 2018 which she scored three goals in eight games to power her side to the Damallsvenskan for the first time, it stated.
